34b7('bum): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
35a1('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyi stong
35a2('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs
35a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs
35a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dor ba med pa
35a5('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang gi
35a6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
35a7('bum): tshul dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
35b1('bum): rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dbang po rnams
35b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lAm mi dmigs pa'i tshul
35b3('bum): dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
35b4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
35b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mngon
35b6('bum): par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin gshegs
35b7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang //
36a1('bum): byams pa chen po rnams mo dmigs pa'i tshul dang /spyong rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma
36a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam pa thams cad
36a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
36a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan/ci'i phyir na byang chub sems
36a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/
36a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
36a7('bum): gau tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid
36b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
36b2('bum): nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid
36b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa
36b4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lug bdun dang /
36b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
36b6('bum): pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
36b7('bum): pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa ba'i
37a1('bum): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ni tsa
37a2('bum): phyir bstan/ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing /des na byang
37a3('bum): chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs
37a4('bum): su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin/ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom
37a5('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs
37a6('bum): par 'gyur/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyan chud
37a7('bum): par mi 'gyur ba yin/ci'i phyir ni 'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba yin/ci'i phyir na
37b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i
37b2('bum): spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs
37b3('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
37b4('bum): ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//
37b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog pa gsum
37b6('bum): rgya cher bstan to//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul
37b7('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir
38a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher
38a2('bum): bstan to//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i
38a3('bum): tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//chos thams cad stong pa nyid
38a4('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//rong gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan
38a5('bum): to//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
38a6('bum): thethug pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
38a7('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bston to//nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//
38b1('bum): sesems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
38b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong
38b3('bum): pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa
38b4('bum): nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang
38b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
38b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
38b7('bum): bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam
39a1('bum): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas/
39a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting
39a3('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
39a4('bum): bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
39a5('bum): po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol
39a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs
39a7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing naso sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu
39b1('bum): drung du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang
39b2('bum): thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhug pa med pa'i tshul
39b3('bum): gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang //
39b4('bum): rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
39b5('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing /khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
39b6('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
39b7('bum): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
40a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po
40a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha
40a3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi
40a4('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
40a5('bum): pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
40a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
40a7('bum): bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang
40b1('bum): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
40b2('bum): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang
40b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
40b4('bum): chen po rnams/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i
40b5('bum): chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
40b6('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom
40b7('bum): ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /
41a1('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhug par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rma
41a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa
41a3('bum): dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan
41a4('bum): par 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas/sems bcu
41a5('bum): pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
41a6('bum): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi
41a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
41b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
41b2('bum): dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
41b3('bum): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
41b4('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad
41b5('bum): mod pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par
41b6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
41b7('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang //
42a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang //
42a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te
42a3('bum): skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi
42a4('bum): zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par
42a5('bum): bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa
42a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis
42a7('bum): kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
42b1('bum): rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa
42b2('bum): dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
42b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i
42b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
42b5('bum): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong po nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong
42b6('bum): pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
42b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi
43a1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar
43a2('bum): bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
43a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
43a4('bum): bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
43a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams nad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
43a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
43a7('bum): kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des ni byang chub
43b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//dus na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su
43b2('bum): nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
43b3('bum): rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs
43b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /
43b5('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa
43b6('bum): med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan
43b7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing /khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
44a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas/sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
44a2('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
44a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang
44a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
44a5('bum): dang du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams
44a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
44a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
44b1('bum): stongs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med
44b2('bum): pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar
44b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
44b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
44b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang
44b6('bum): bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes
44b7('bum): pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom
45a1('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
45a2('bum): kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam
45a3('bum): yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems
45a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs
45a5('bum): pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad
45a6('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya lnga pa//don dam pa stong pa
45a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
45b1('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
45b2('bum): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /sbyong ba
45b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus mi byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha'i las 'das pa stong pa
45b4('bum): nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngo //rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan
45b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar
45b6('bum): bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
45b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
46a1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
46a2('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
46a3('bum): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
46a4('bum): dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems
46a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med
46a6('bum): pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba
46a7('bum): dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas
46b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam
46b2('bum): par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i
46b3('bum): spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs
46b4('bum): pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
46b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpo'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
46b6('bum): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
46b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
47a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med
47a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa
47a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
47a4('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam
47a5('bum): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
47a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
47a7('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
47b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te//
47b2('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las
47b3('bum): yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
47b4('bum): rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas
47b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /
47b6('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs
47b7('bum): pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don
48a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phyags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas
48a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
48a3('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a4('bum): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid
48a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
48a6('bum): thog ma drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
48a7('bum): dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
48b1('bum): pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
48b2('bum): lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam
48b3('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
48b4('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
48b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems
48b6('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bston te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha
48b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs
49a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud
49a2('bum): du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam
49a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par
49a4('bum): bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang //
49a5('bum): mnyam par bzhag pa'i spongs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
49a6('bum): shing byang zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba
49a7('bum): bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
49b1('bum): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /
49b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong
49b3('bum): pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa
49b4('bum): nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
49b5('bum): nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
49b6('bum): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
49b7('bum): bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
50a1('bum): pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang //
50a2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang
50a3('bum): bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa'
50a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med
50a5('bum): pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtse ba gong gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
50a6('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
50a7('bum): dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa
50b1('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang //
50b2('bum): rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig
50b3('bum): rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
50b4('bum): chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
50b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
50b6('bum): pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong
50b7('bum): pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
51a1('bum): dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshon nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo
51a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang
51a3('bum): po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /
51a4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar
51a5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin
51a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
51a7('bum): bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub
51b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med
51b2('bum): pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur
51b3('bum): stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
51b4('bum): gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis
51b5('bum): kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i
51b6('bum): spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las
51b7('bum): mngon par 'phags shing byad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba
52a1('bum): bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
52a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a3('bum): dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas
52a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin
52a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid
52a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang
52a7('bum): po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /
52b1('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
52b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs
52b3('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
52b4('bum): dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems
52b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med
52b6('bum): pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur
52b7('bum): stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
53a1('bum): chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par
53a2('bum): bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs
53a3('bum): pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs
53a4('bum): pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
53a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas/sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol
53a6('bum): tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
53a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa
53b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
53b2('bum): dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
53b3('bum): nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /
53b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
53b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
53b6('bum): dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
53b7('bum): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa'
54a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
54a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//
54a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba
54a4('bum): dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam
54a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
54a6('bum): par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs
54a7('bum): pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
54b1('bum): 'phags shing khyud zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//
54b2('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
54b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
54b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'das byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las
54b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid
54b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
54b7('bum): pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
55a1('bum): brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam
55a2('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
55a3('bum): par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
55a4('bum): rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
55a5('bum): kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
55a6('bum): brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong
55a7('bum): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa
55b1('bum): bde dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyan
55b2('bum): chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
55b3('bum): dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel
55b4('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spongs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid
55b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam
55b6('bum): 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
55b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa
56a1('bum): nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang
56a2('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa
56a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong
56a4('bum): ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags
56a5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
56a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams
56a7('bum): cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po
56b1('bum): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis
56b2('bum): rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na
56b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'drong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs
56b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs
56b5('bum): par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug
56b6('bum): pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul
56b7('bum): gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /
57a1('bum): don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//mi
57a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems
57a3('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
57a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
57a5('bum): dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
57a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa
57a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag
57b1('bum): par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags
57b2('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
57b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
57b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
57b5('bum): po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse
57b6('bum): ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par
57b7('bum): shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom
58a1('bum): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum
58a2('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur
58a3('bum): ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i
58a4('bum): tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs pa
58a5('bum): dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa
58a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di
58a7('bum): lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
58b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /
58b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa
58b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang //
58b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
58b5('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /
58b6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
58b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
59a1('bum): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
59a2('bum): brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems
59a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa
59a4('bum): med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba
59a5('bum): dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan
59a6('bum): 'das de dag las chos gung thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug pa med pa dang /mnyam
59a7('bum): par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhog par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa
59b1('bum): med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spongs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /
59b2('bum): 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
59b3('bum): chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
59b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
59b5('bum): tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus
59b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang
59b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid
60a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
60a2('bum): dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan
60a3('bum): bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
60a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
60a5('bum): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
60a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag
60a7('bum): kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon
60b1('bum): par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas
60b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par
60b3('bum): 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//'khrug
60b4('bum): pa med pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i
60b5('bum): tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /'brel pa'i spobs
60b6('bum): pa dang /don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i
60b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
61a1('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
61a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
61a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byos stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa
61a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi
61a5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
61a6('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
61a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
61b1('bum): bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
61b2('bum): par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
61b3('bum): bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
61b4('bum): shes pa dang /rdzu 'phral gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brdzus te skye bar
61b5('bum): 'gyur zhes bya'o//des na mngon par shes pa rnams las yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du'ang 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtse
61b6('bum): ba gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
61b7('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de dag rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun chad par
62a1('bum): sna 'o//'byu pa med pa nga sanyam par zhag pa mang du drug tu nyam par nag par gyu /sgyu so sa
62a2('bum): 'dzin pa dang /mi myis rnam kyi sa padang / nga na
62a3('bum): pa dang /'brel pa'i ngas pa dang /don du ldan pa'i thabs pa dang /'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'gags shing byu gnas sa pa nga yang ldan par
62b1('bum): /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtsho ma'i lha dang /dga' ldan gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha
62b2('bum): dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs lha nyi phan gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /tshangs chen gyi lha dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung
62b3('bum): snang gi lha dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /dge ba'i lha dang /chung dge'i lha dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /dge rgyas kyi lha dang /che ba'i lha dang /
62b4('bum): chung che'i lha dang /tshad med che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /
62b5('bum): min gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste/bstan na de la bdag cag gis kyang shes
62b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/me tog dag mngon par sprul par byas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
62b7('bum): po rnams dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o//mngon par gtor bar bya'o//rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po
63a1('bum): brgya byin dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtshe ma'i lha dang /
63a2('bum): dga' ldan gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /
63a3('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung snang gi lha dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /dge ba'i lha dang /chung dge'i lha dang /tshad med
63a4('bum): dge ba'i lha dang /dge rgyas kyi lha dang /che ba'i lha dang /chung che'i lha dang /tshad med che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /
63a5('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /'og min gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/lha rdzas kyi
63a6('bum): me tog man+da ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams
63a7('bum): dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to//mngon par 'thor bar gyur to//rab tu 'thor bar gyur to//me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong gsum gyi
63b1('bum): sbyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas/steng gi bar snang la'ang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
63b2('bum): gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas kun nas gnas par gyur to//de nas gnas brten rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor
63b3('bum): ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na'ang yod par ma mthong ste/me tog 'di dag ni mngon par sprul pa'o//'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon
63b4('bum): par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/chu las skyes pa ma yin/thang las skyes pa ma yin no//'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog
63b5('bum): 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so///
63b6('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no//ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de
63b7('bum): skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste/me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/kau shi ka de ltar ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin
64a1('bum): no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nye tshe ma byung bar zad dam/'on tam gzugs kyang ma byung /tshor ba'ang ma byung /'du shes
64a2('bum): kyang ma byung /'du byed kyang ma byung /rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar ma zad kI/kau shi ka gzugs
64a3('bum): kyang ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no//kau shi ka tshor ba'ang mi byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/
64a4('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no//kau shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung
64a5('bum): ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no//
64a6('bum): kau shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sna ma yin no//kau shri ka lce ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no//kau shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba
64a7('bum): de ni lus ma yin no//kau shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no//kau shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no//kau shi ka sgra
64b1('bum): nime byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sgyu ma yin no//kau shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni dri ma yin no//kau shi ka ro ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni ro ma yin no//kau shi ka reg
64b2('bum): ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rag ma yin no//kau shi ka chos nim byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no//kau shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba
64b3('bum): de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni ma
64b4('bum): byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka lus
64b5('bum): kye rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi rnam par
64b6('bum): shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/
64b7('bum): gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg
65a1('bum): pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te
65a2('bum): reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni
65a3('bum): ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni
65a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shr-i ka sA'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
65a5('bum): tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka lus
65a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
65a7('bum): ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams
65b1('bum): ma yin no//kau shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka mo'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mo'i khams ma yin no//
65b2('bum): kau shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no//kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin no//
65b3('bum): kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma
65b4('bum): yin no//kau shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//
65b5('bum): kau shri ka ming dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin no//kau shi ka skye mched drug ni mi byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no//
65b6('bum): kau shi ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rog pa ma yin no//kau shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka srid pa ni mi byung ba ste/gang
65b7('bum): ma byung ba de ni sred pa ma yin no//kau shi ka len pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni len pa ma yin no//kau shi ka srid pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni srid pa ma
66a1('bum): yin no//kau shI ka skye ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no//kau shi karka shrI ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no//
66a2('bum): kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang
66a3('bum): ma byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//
66a4('bum): kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma
66a5('bum): byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
66a6('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shI ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni phyi stong pa
