175a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang
175a6('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam
175a7('bum): par thar pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam par thar
175b1('bum): pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin
175b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i

175b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de
175b5('bum): bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'adra ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mu med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin
175b6('bum): bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang
175b7('bum): ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//
176a1('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mngon par shes pa'i chos
176a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mngon par shes pa'i chos
176a3('bum): nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral
176a4('bum): ba'ang ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma
176a5('bum): yin no//ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid
176a6('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang
176a7('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin
176b1('bum): pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//de
176b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma
176b3('bum): yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid dang
176b4('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan
176b5('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//
176b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin
176b7('bum): no//so so yang dag par rig pa'i chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan
177a1('bum): 'a sa na// martan ma dang ldan pa 'dam pan phyul ba san// dun tu dun
177a2('bum): du'ang ma yi tha la da'ang ma yin no//byams pa chen po'i chos nyid pa yin pa gzhan dang ldan du'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin shegs pa gang yin pa na/
177a3('bum): rjechen po'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//snying rje chen po'i chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//snying rje chen po'i dri bzhin nyid ma yin pa
177a4('bum): na dang ldan pa'ang mi yi rgyal du 'dus na pa tsham nyid na yin pa gas nga ldan pa dang sa yin pa la sa yin shegs pa ra
177a5('bum): yin sa /sang/rgyas kyi cho sum 'dres pa 'di bani khyod dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'angam ldanan//sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres kyi'i chos nyid dang ldan pa 'dus yin rnal
177a6('bum): ba'ang ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i chos nyid pa yin gyi
177a7('bum): gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//
177b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//thams cad
177b2('bum): shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan
177b3('bum): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang
177b4('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa
177b5('bum): de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//
177b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma
177b7('bum): yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka 'di ni gang chos 'di dag thams cad dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin pa de'i mthu ste/byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis/de'i byin gyi
178a1('bum): rlabs so///shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyub//bam po brgya bcu gnyis pa/kau shi ka gang yang 'di skad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a2('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang nas btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/kau shi ka gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/gzugs las gzhan du'ang
178a3('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o//tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/tshor ba las gzhan du 'ang btsal bar mi byu'o//'du shes las kyang btsal bar ma bya/'du shes lus
178a4('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//'du byed lngas kyang potsA lta bur mi bya/'du byed las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
178a5('bum): rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /'du shes
178a6('bum): gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
178a7('bum): pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan
178b1('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig las kyang btsal
178b2('bum): pabar mi bya/mig las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rna ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rna ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sna las kyang btsal bar mi
178b3('bum): bya/sna las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lci las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lce las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lus las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lus
178b4('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//yod las kyang btsal bar mi bya/yid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gang
178b5('bum): yin pa dang /rna ba gang yin pa dang /sna gang yin pa dang /lce gang yin pa dang /lus gang yin pa dang /yid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
178b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/
178b7('bum): thogs pa med pa/mtshon nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179a1('bum): pa ni gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/gzugs las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sgra las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sgra las
179a2('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//dri las kyang btsal bar mi bya/dri las gzhan du'ang btsal ba ri mo bya'o//ro las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ro lus
179a3('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//reg las kyang btsal bar mi bya/reg las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//chos las kyang btsal bar mi bya/chos
179a4('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal ba mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang /sgra gang yin pa dang /dri gang yin pa dang /ro gang
179a5('bum): yin pa dang /reg gang yin pa dang /chos gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba
179a6('bum): gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di
179a7('bum): ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/mig gi rnam par shes pa las
179b1('bum): kyang btsal bar mi bya/mig gi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rna ba'i rnam par shes/
179b2('bum): pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bor mi bya/sna'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal por mi bya'o//lce'i rnam
179b3('bum): par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lce'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lus kyi
179b4('bum): rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa las kyang btsol bar mi bya/yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
179b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa
179b6('bum): dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
179b7('bum): pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/
180a1('bum): bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
180a2('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du 'ango btsal bar mi bya'o//rna ba'i
180a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sna'i 'dus
180a4('bum): te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lus kyi
180a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/yid
180a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar migau gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa
180a7('bum): dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg po gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /
180b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/
180b2('bum): gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
180b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal
180b4('bum): bar mi bya'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi ba/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sna'i
180b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sna'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
180b6('bum): gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang
180b7('bum): btsal bar mi bya/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/
181a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shaM kA dI ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
181a2('bum): kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg
181a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /byang
181a4('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang
181a5('bum): ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
181a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sa'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sa'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//chu'i khams las
181a7('bum): kyang btsal bar mi bya/chu'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//me'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/me'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
181b1('bum): rlung gi khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rlung gi khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//nam mkha'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/nam mkha'i khams
181b2('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rnam par shes pa'i khams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de
181b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /chu'i khams gang yin pa dang /me'i khams gang yin pa dang /rlung gi khams gang yin po dang /nam
181b4('bum): mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal
181b5('bum): ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di
181b6('bum): lhur mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ma rig pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ma
181b7('bum): rig pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//'du byed las kyang ngatsal bar mi bya/'du byed las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal
182a1('bum): bar mi bya/rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mo bya'o//mong dang gzugs las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ming dang gzugs las gzhan du'ang
182a2('bum): btsal bar mi bya'o//skye mched drug las kyang btsal bar mi bya/skye mched drug las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//reg pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/reg
182a3('bum): pa las gzhan du'ang btsol bar mi bya'o//tshor ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/tshor ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//sred pa las kyang btsal bar
182a4('bum): mi bya/sred pa las gzhan du'ang btsol bar mi bya'o//len pa las kyang btsol bar mi bya/len pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//srid pa las kyang btsal
182a5('bum): bar mi bya/srid pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//skye ba las kyang btsal bar mi bya/skye ba las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//rga shi las kyang
182a6('bum): btsal por mi bya/rga shi las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /'du byed gang yin pa dang /rnam
182a7('bum): par shes pa gang yin pa dang /ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /skye mo tshad drug gang yin pa dang /rig pa gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /sred pa
182b1('bum): gang yin pa dang /len pa gang yin pa dang /srid pa gang yin pa dang /skye ba gang yin pa dang /rga shi gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab
182b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs
182b3('bum): pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni//
182b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang
182b5('bum): btsal bar mi bya/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa los gzhan du'ang btsol bar mi bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/bzod pa'i pha
182b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan
182b7('bum): du'ang btsil bar mi bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal por mi bya/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
183a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe
183a2('bum): na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
183a3('bum): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang //
183a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan
183a5('bum): pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/ba ltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub
183a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi
183a7('bum): bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/phyi nang
183b1('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//chen po
183b2('bum): stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o/don dam pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/don dam pa stong pa
183b3('bum): nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//'dus
183b4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi
183b5('bum): byamatha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/thog ma dang tha ma med pa
183b6('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
183b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/chos
184a1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang bcol bar mi bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
184a2('bum): las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//dngos
184a3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhon du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya//
184a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las kyang bcol bar mi bya/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid
184a5('bum): pas gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
184a6('bum): gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus byos stong pa nyid
184a7('bum): gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
184b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin
184b2('bum): pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
184b3('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad
184b4('bum): ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi
184b5('bum): ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/dran pa nye bar bzhag
184b6('bum): pa rnams las gzhan du'ang bcol bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka don 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang
184b7('bum): yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan po'ang ma yin/gzugs
185a1('bum): med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems
185a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan
185a3('bum): du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
185a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa//
185a5('bum): bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
185a6('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
185a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
185b1('bum): yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan
185b2('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/dbang po
185b3('bum): rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/dbang po rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang /
185b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang
185b5('bum): ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
185b6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/stobs rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir
185b7('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gong
186a1('bum): yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid
186a2('bum): gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub kyi yan
186a3('bum): lag rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang
186a4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos
186a5('bum): de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid
186a6('bum): med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las kyang
186a7('bum): btsal bar mi bya/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan
186b1('bum): lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni
186b2('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang mi yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka/
186b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/'phags pa'i
186b4('bum): bden pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
186b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin//
186b6('bum): gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
186b7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/bsam gtan rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
187a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187a2('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa
187a3('bum): thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
187a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/tshad med pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/tshad med pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
187a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin
187a6('bum): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar
187a7('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
187b1('bum): pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang brdol bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
187b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang
187b3('bum): yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar
187b4('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rnam par thar pa rnams las kyang btsal
187b5('bum): bar mi bya/rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhon du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang
187b6('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ong
187b7('bum): ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems
188a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya//
188a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i
188a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin
188a4('bum): pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar
188a5('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
188a6('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las
188a7('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gang
188b1('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma
188b2('bum): yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang
188b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/mngon par shes pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/mngon par shes pa rnams las
188b4('bum): gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes
188b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ong ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa//
188b6('bum): thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di lhur mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen byos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
188b7('bum): phyin pa ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du'ang bcol bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting
189a1('bum): 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i
189a2('bum): chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar
189a3('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las kyang
189a4('bum): btsal bar mi bya/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /
189a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsol ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi
189a6('bum): ljon pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shri ka gzhan
189a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya//
189b1('bum): zhon gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang
189b2('bum): yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan//
189b3('bum): pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau
189b4('bum): shrI ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/mi 'jigs pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/mi
189b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ko de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems
189b6('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po gang yin pa dang /btsal ba grang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin//
189b7('bum): gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
190a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las kyang btsa lnga bar mi bya/so so yang
190a2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang yin pa
190a3('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan
190a4('bum): bya'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//
190a5('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byams pa chen po las kyang btsal bar mi bya/byams
190a6('bum): pa chen po las gzhan du'adra btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpo'i grong
190a7('bum): yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin//
190b1('bum): gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
190b2('bum): sems dpa' chen byos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/snying rje chen po las kyang btsal bar mi bya/snying rje chen po las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
190b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin po dang //
190b4('bum): btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid
190b5('bum): gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/spangs
190b6('bum): rgyus ky-i chos ma 'dres pa rnams las kyang btsal bar mi bya/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir na
190b7('bum): no/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
191a1('bum): gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa 'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar
191a2('bum): med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191a3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/thams cad shes pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o///
191a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kau de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
191a5('bum): pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med po//
191a6('bum): thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
191a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las kyang btsal bar mi bya/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//
191b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lAm gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
191b2('bum): gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med
191b3('bum): pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni//
191b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang btsa la bAr mi bya/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
191b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal
191b6('bum): ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/
191b7('bum): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang shes
192a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
192a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
192a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin
192a4('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes
192a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
192a6('bum): yin/'du shos las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du shes
192a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi yin/'du shes kyi chos
192b1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed las gud na 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192b2('bum): phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gudo na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
192b3('bum): med do//'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par
192b4('bum): shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang
192b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
192b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
192b7('bum): ma yin/mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud
193a1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang/
193a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna
193a3('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes
193a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna las
193a5('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
193a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'ang
193a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi yin/lce las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
193b1('bum): lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
193b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi de bzhin nyid
193b3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b4('bum): phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//yid las gud na'ang shes
193b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
193b6('bum): yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b7('bum): phyin pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ango shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de
194a1('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs
194a2('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sgra'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sgra las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194a3('bum): med do//sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sgra'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sgra'i chos nyid
194a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sgra'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dri'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
194a5('bum): dri las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
194a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//dri'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dri'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'ang shes
194a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ro las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ro'i
194b1('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ro'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
194b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do//reg kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg las gud na'ang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg gi de bzhin nyid
194b3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
194b4('bum): pa ma yin/reg gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos las gud na'ang shes
194b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194b6('bum): med do//chos kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes
194b7('bum): pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
195b1('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'o rnam par shes pa'i/
195b2('bum): chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de//lha'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa las
195b3('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de
195b4('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes
195b5('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes
195b6('bum): pa las brung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par
195b7('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
196a1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
196a2('bum): phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
196a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid
196a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg
196a5('bum): ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'adra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de
196a6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi
196a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna
196b1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
196b2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te
196b3('bum): reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i
196b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de
196b5('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg
196b6('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lho'i 'dus te reg
196b7('bum): pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes
197a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i
197a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
197a3('bum): do/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
197a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
197a5('bum): tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
197a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197a7('bum): phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
197b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud nA'ang
197b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis
197b3('bum): tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
197b4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos
197b5('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid lus gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i
197b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shos rab kyi pha rol tu
197b7('bum): phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
198a1('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
198a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
198a3('bum): gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i
198a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te rerig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud
198a5('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg
198a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'adu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a7('bum): phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin
198b1('bum): nyi kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
198b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud nA'ang
198b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
198b4('bum): gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
198b5('bum): ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
198b6('bum): tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
198b7('bum): do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
199a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg
199a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
199a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do///
199a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya bcu gsum pa//sa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sa'i khams las gud
199a5('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
199a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
199a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chu'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
199b1('bum): chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chu'i
199b2('bum): khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//me'i khams kyang
199b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/me'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
199b4('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po med do//me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
199b5('bum): pa ma yin/me'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rlung gi khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rlung gi
199b6('bum): khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin
199b7('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid las
200a1('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams las gud
200a2('bum): nu'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin
200a3('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams
200a4('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par
200a5('bum): shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
200a6('bum): yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang
200a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ma rig pa'ang shes
200b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yIn/ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mya rig pa'i dri bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200b2('bum): ma yin/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi rig
200b3('bum): pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab
200b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
200b5('bum): tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi cho skye nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
200b6('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam por shes pa las gud na'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i de
200b7('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes
201a1('bum): pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
201a2('bum): ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mido dang gzugs kyi
201a3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ming dang
201a4('bum): gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye
201a5('bum): mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang
201a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye mched drug gi dri bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang
201a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye moched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg pa'ang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
201b1('bum): yin/reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do//reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lngas//
201b2('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
201b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
201b4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
201b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa las gud
201b6('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
201b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
202a1('bum): lon pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lon pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//len pa'i de bzhin nyid
202a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/len pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes
202a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/len pa'i chos nyid lasna gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skyid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a4('bum): ma yin/srid po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/srid pa'i de
202a5('bum): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/srid pa'i chos nyid las
202a6('bum): gud na rang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
202a7('bum): do/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye ba'i
202b1('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
202b2('bum): yin/rga shi las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po med do//rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la so gud
202b3('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
202b4('bum): phyin pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b5('bum): pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
202b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang
202b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yon/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud
203a1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul///
203a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
203a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
203a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de
203a5('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
203a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
203a7('bum): phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
203b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
203b2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi
203b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
203b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lngas gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
203b5('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
203b6('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud no'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab
203b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi pha
204a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gung na'ang shes rang rgya
204a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las
204a3('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
204a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
204a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
204a6('bum): phyin pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid
204a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de//phyi stong pa nyid
204b1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
204b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
204b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
204b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
204b5('bum): pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
204b6('bum): yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
204b7('bum): pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chen
205a1('bum): po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
205a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
205a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/don dam
205a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid lus gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/don dram
205a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
205a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus
205a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus
205b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus byas/
205b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
205b3('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
205b4('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas
205b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mtha' las
205b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud ni'adu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
205b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
206a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
206a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma
206a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'adra shes rab kyi pha rol
206a4('bum): tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud
206a5('bum): na'ong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes
206a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
206a7('bum): bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
206b1('bum): chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes
206b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
206b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
206b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
206b5('bum): phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
206b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
206b7('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang/
207a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang gi mtshon
207a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
207a3('bum): yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
207a4('bum): pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
207a5('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ango shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
207a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong
207a7('bum): pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi
207b1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong
207b2('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa
207b3('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes
207b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
207b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
207b6('bum): phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
