207b7('bum): phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
208a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dran
208a2('bum): panye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin+da/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dran pa
208a3('bum): b+har bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa me sbyin/dran pa nye bar bzlog pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na du shes rab kyi pha rol
208a4('bum): byiphyin pa med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud nu'ang
208a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang dag par spyong ba rnams las gud na'ang shes rab
208a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gung
208a7('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid
208b1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab
208b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
208b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang
208b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
208b5('bum): dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dbang
208b6('bum): po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams kyang
208b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
209a1('bum): pa ma yin/stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
209a2('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a3('bum): ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
209a4('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
209a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i lam yan
209a6('bum): lagra brgyad pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa med do//'phags/
209a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
209b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
209b2('bum): brkyad pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags
209b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
209b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209b5('bum): phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
209b6('bum): phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209b7('bum): mo yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
210a1('bum): ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210a2('bum): pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
210a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
210a4('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
210a5('bum): ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
210a6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
210a7('bum): med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
210b1('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams las bud na'ang
210b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
210b3('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud
210b4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
210b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
210b6('bum): pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
210b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
211a1('bum): phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par
211a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
211a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
211a4('bum): pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos
211a5('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
211a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a7('bum): med do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
211b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
211b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge
211b3('bum): 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge 'dzin
211b4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
211b5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab
211b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
211b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi
212a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
212a2('bum): stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
212a3('bum): phyin pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid
212a4('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes
212a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
212a6('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud
212a7('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud
212b1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
212b2('bum): de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang
212b3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/snying rje chen po las
212b4('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
212b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
212b6('bum): med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
212b7('bum): pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
213a1('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin
213a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
213a3('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thams cad
213a4('bum): shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thams
213a5('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa
213a6('bum): shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam
213a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam
213b1('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam
213b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
213b3('bum): yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
213b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do////shes rab kyi pha
213b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya bcu bzhi pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa ste/de ltar
213b6('bum): chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas na/gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
213b7('bum): do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs
214a1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor bldang shes/
214a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba las brud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
214a3('bum): song ba'i de bzhin nyid las gung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor po'i chos nyid las
214a4('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du shes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu yin/'du shes las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
214a5('bum): med do//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
214a6('bum): 'du shes kyi cho sa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du shes kyi chos nyid las grung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi
214a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
214b1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed
214b2('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang
214b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
214b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'adra shes rab
214b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang
214b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
214b7('bum): mig gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215a1('bum): med do//rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
215a2('bum): rna ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
215a3('bum): ma yin/sna las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
215a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
215a5('bum): lce'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
215a6('bum): lce'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i chos nyid las bud na'ang
215a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus
215b1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
215b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid las grud na'ang shes
215b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do///
215b4('bum): yid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
215b5('bum): pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin
215b6('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
215b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sgra'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sgra las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sgra'i de bzhini nyid kyang shes
216a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sgra'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sgra'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
216a2('bum): phyin pa ma yin/sgra'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dri'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dri las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
216a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dri'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol ci phyin pa med do//dri'i
216a4('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dri'i chos nyid las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
216a5('bum): yin/ro las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ro'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
216a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ro'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ro'i chos nyid los gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
216a7('bum): reg kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216b1('bum): ma yin/reg gi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rog gi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg gi chos nyid las
216b2('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos
216b3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab
216b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
216b5('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
216b6('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
216b7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i rnam
217a1('bum): par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
217a2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
217a3('bum): ma yin/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
217a4('bum): yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
217a5('bum): ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
217a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
217a7('bum): tu byin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
217b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
217b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab
217b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab
217b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang
217b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang shes
217b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi
217b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
218a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg
218a2('bum): pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
218a3('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig go 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'angango shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi
218a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
218a5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te
218a6('bum): reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i
218a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i
218b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te rnyog pa las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i dri bzhin
218b2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid
218b3('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi
218b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
218b5('bum): pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhi ni nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
218b6('bum): ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus tAM reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
218b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus
219a1('bum): kye 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shos rab kyi pha
219a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
219a3('bum): tu phyin po ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
219a4('bum): phyid pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab
219a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
219a6('bum): ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te
219a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
219b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
219b2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'o 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
219b3('bum): gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
219b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes
219b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
219b6('bum): gyis tshor ba 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg
219b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220a1('bum): phyin pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
220a2('bum): chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg
220a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
220a4('bum): yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
220a5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te rig
220a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus
220a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
220b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
220b2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
220b3('bum): tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi
220b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
220b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
220b6('bum): phyin pa mo yin/sa'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sa'i khams
220b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sa'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud
221a1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chu'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221a2('bum): med do//chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul
221a3('bum): khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chu'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//me'i khams kyang shes rab kyi
221a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/me'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/me'i
221a5('bum): khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mye'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/me'i khams kyi chos nyid las
221a6('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rlung gi khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu yin/rlung gi khams las gud na 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
221a7('bum): de/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rlung
221b1('bum): gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa ma yin/rlung gi khams kyu chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyang shes/
221b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
221b3('bum): ma yin/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nam
221b4('bum): mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams
221b5('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
221b6('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid
221b7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ma rig pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ma rig pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ma rig
222a1('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ma rig pa'i chos
222a2('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ma rig pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
222a3('bum): 'du byed las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
222a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'du byed kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
222a5('bum): do|da rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang
222a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
222a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ming dang gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
222b1('bum): ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin/
222b2('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud
222b3('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye mched drug kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye mched drug las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
222b4('bum): skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye mched drug go de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye mched drug gi
222b5('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye mched drug gi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222b6('bum): phyin pa ma yin/reg pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid las
222b7('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//reg pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/reg pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223a1('bum): phyin pa med do//tshor ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
223a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
223a3('bum): pa ma yin/tshor ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sred pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa las gud na'ang shes rab
223a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lngas gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
223a5('bum): sred pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sred pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//len pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
223a6('bum): pa ma yin/len pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/len pa'i de bzhin nyid las
223a7('bum): bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//len pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/len pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223b1('bum): byin pa med do//srid pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/srid pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab
223b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//srid pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
223b3('bum): srid pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye ba'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b4('bum): med do//skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye ba'i chos nyid kyang
223b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/skye ba'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rga shi'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rga shi
223b6('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
223b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//rga shi'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rga shi'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sbyin pa'i
224a1('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//smon
224a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224a3('bum): med do//smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
224a4('bum): tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
224a5('bum): phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las grung na'ang
224a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid
224a7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud
224b1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
224b2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos
224b3('bum): nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224b4('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
224b5('bum): phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma yin/rtson
224b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/
224b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
225a1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol
225a2('bum): tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
225a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi
225a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
225a5('bum): med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
225a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid
225a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi
225b1('bum): chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
225b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
225b3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid kyi
225b4('bum): chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
225b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
225b6('bum): tu phyin pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
225b7('bum): do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
226a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma min/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stong/
226a2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
226a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid kyi
226a4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi yin/chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid
226a5('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
226a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
226a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi
226b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
226b2('bum): yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus byas
226b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus byas stong pa
226b4('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las
226b5('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
226b6('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
226b7('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
227a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong
227a2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mtha' las
227a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thog ma
227a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
227a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
227a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
227a7('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227b1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
227b2('bum): phyin pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
227b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa
227b4('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid
227b5('bum): kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
227b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid las gud
227b7('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud
228a1('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
228a2('bum): lus grung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
228a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mA yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
228a4('bum): chos nyid las gud ni 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
228a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lus
228a6('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
228a7('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
228b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
228b2('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las
228b3('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228b4('bum): phyin pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
228b5('bum): do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med
228b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dngos po med
228b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
229a1('bum): pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
229a2('bum): las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las
229a3('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
229a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag
229a5('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba
229a6('bum): rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang dag par spong
229a7('bum): ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/yang
229b1('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi
229b2('bum): rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
229b3('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul
229b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dbang po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams las gud
229b5('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
229b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
229b7('bum): tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams kyi de
230a1('bum): bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//stobs rnams
230a2('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang
230a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin
230a4('bum): nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byang chub kyi yan
230a5('bum): lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags
230a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags
230a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
230b1('bum): tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'o lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang
230b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
230b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
230b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid las
230b5('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
230b6('bum): phyin pa med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
230b7('bum): po med do//bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
231a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin
231a2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
231a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha
231a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams///
231a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
231a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang
231a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
231b1('bum): do/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par
231b2('bum): thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i/
231b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
231b4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las
231b5('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
231b6('bum): bapar 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
231b7('bum): phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med de//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
232a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
232a2('bum): smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang
232a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
232a4('bum): do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mngon par shes pa
232a5('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mngon par shes pa
232a6('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams
232a7('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhini nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b1('bum): phyin pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las bud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ting nge
232b2('bum): 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang
232b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi
232b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
232b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de bzhin
232b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b7('bum): phyin pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
233a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a2('bum): phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a3('bum): phyin pa med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
233a4('bum): do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//so
233a5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a6('bum): phyin pa med do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab
233a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byams pa chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byams pa chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byams
233b1('bum): pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//byams pa chen po'i chos nyid
233b2('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/byams pa chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
233b3('bum): snying rje chen po las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gud
233b4('bum): na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233b5('bum): phyin pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
233b6('bum): mod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes
233b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid las
234a1('bum): gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang
234a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang
234a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes
234a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
234a5('bum): pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
234a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
234a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
234b1('bum): pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mabyon pa nyid kyi dri bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
234b2('bum): phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol
234b3('bum): tu phyin pa med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyam//bam po brgya bco lnga pa//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la
234b4('bum): 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//btsun
234b5('bum): pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
234b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de la bslabs shing /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/rgyun
234b7('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi
235a1('bum): 'ong ba rnams kyis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//thob bo//'thob par
235a2('bum): 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so//mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//de la bslabs shing byang chub
235a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/sems can yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
235a4('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de
235a5('bum): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'
235a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
235a7('bum): ni mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo/'thob par
235b1('bum): 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
235b2('bum): thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/rang byang chub tu
235b3('bum): mngon par sangs rgyas so//mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su
235b4('bum): smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
235b5('bum): rgyurgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i
235b6('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phye ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
235b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so///
236a1('bum): kau shi ka 'du shes rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
236a2('bum): 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
236a3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//
236a4('bum): kau shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam
236a5('bum): par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
236a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rna brgya
236a7('bum): che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
236b1('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sna rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi/
236b2('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lce rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
236b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus rgya che ba'i
236b4('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'
236b5('bum): mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka yid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka de ni
236b6('bum): 'di ltar yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
236b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sgra rgya che ba'i phyir/
237a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
237a2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dri rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
237a3('bum): kr-i shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka ro rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
237a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shri ka reg rgya
237a5('bum): che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
237a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shri ka chos rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de
237a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kaM shi ka mig go rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/
237b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
237b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
237b3('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mI dmigs so//kau shi kra sI'i rnam par shes pa rgya che
237b4('bum): ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi
237b5('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi kA lce'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
237b6('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa rgya
