237b7('bum): che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
238a1('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mo dmigs/dbus mo dmigs so//kau sho ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sdoms dpa' chen po
238a2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha'i mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
238a3('bum): dmigs so//kau sha~M ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de
238a4('bum): ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmi gas/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau sho ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub
238a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
238a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/dbus myi dmigs so//kau shi kra sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya
238a7('bum): che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtho'i mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka
238b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg
238b2('bum): pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
238b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau/
238b4('bum): shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid
238b5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub
238b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
238b7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
239a1('bum): phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mo dmigs/
239a2('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i
239a3('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te
239a4('bum): rerig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
239a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che
239a6('bum): ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
239a7('bum): tshor po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
239b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phye ma'i
239b2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i
239b3('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka chu'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems
239b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/
239b5('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka me'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
239b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar me'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rlung gi khams rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
240a1('bum): so/dkau shi ka nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
240a2('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir//
240a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi
240a4('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka ma rig pa rgya tsho ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
240a5('bum): phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigaso/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'du
240a6('bum): byed rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kaM shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha'
240a7('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
240b1('bum): pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau sho ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mo dmigs/dbus ma dmigs so//kau shi ka ma
240b2('bum): dang gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ming dang gzugs
240b3('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka skye mched drug rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
240b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka reg pa
240b5('bum): rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
240b6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir
240b7('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sred pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
241a1('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/dbus
241a2('bum): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka len pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
241a3('bum): len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka srid pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
241a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka
241a5('bum): skye ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi
241a6('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rga shi rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che
241a7('bum): ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
241b1('bum): phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
241b2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
241b3('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs//
241b4('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir
241b5('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241b6('bum): rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi
241b7('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
242a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
242a2('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyu che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba sbyin
242a3('bum): te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka nang stong
242a4('bum): pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin to/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha'
242a5('bum): me dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya
242a6('bum): che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid rgyu
242a7('bum): che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi
242b1('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
242b2('bum): rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka chen po
242b3('bum): stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon
242b4('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
242b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//
242b6('bum): kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na//kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas
242b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
243a1('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir she na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' ma
243a2('bum): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
243a3('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi
243a4('bum): ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de
243a5('bum): ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/
243a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
243a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba
243b1('bum): yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmyigs so//kau shi ka chos thams
243b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
243b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
243b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
243b5('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
243b6('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha'a'i ma dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dkyus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang
243b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs//
244a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnga ba nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
244a2('bum): phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau
244a3('bum): shAka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shig
244a4('bum): deni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi snron gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rgya che ba'i
244a5('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sngon gyi mtha'
244a6('bum): mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
244a7('bum): phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//
244b1('bum): kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
244b2('bum): gyi rkang pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dbang po rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
244b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka/
244b4('bum): stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi
244b5('bum): dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
244b6('bum): phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi
244b7('bum): ka 'phags pa'i lam rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i
245a1('bum): lam gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phye ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmyigs so//kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems
245a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i
245a3('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka bsam gtan rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin
245a4('bum): te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau sh+lau ka tshad med pa rgyu che ba'i
245a5('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chad med pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
245a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi kra gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
245a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi
245b1('bum): dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
245b2('bum): ltar rnam par thar pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang
245b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi
245b4('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rgya che ba'i phyir
245b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shrI ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma
245b6('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
245b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
246a1('bum): dmigs/dbus mi migasas/kash+loka ti ladu chu 'byor/byang chub se nas dpa' sems dpa'argyan po rnams kyi pha rol tu byon pa 'dun chog ldan/
246a2('bum): te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigaso/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//ko shi ka gzungs kyi sgo na
246a3('bum): ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo'i sngon mtha' mi dmigs
246a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
246a5('bum): pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mo dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//
246a6('bum): kau shI ka mi 'jigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa'i
246a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
246b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
246b2('bum): so//kau shi ka snying rje chen po rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka don 'di ltar snying rje chen
246b3('bum): po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
246b4('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus
246b5('bum): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
246b6('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems
246b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha'
247a1('bum): mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du rgyu
247a2('bum): che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi
247a3('bum): ka rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba yin te/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzugs tshad
247a4('bum): med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su
247a5('bum): med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/gzugs
247a6('bum): tshad med do//gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
247a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka
247b1('bum): de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/tshor ba tshad med do//tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'du shes
247b2('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi tshad ni dmigs su med
247b3('bum): do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'du shes tshad
247b4('bum): med do//'du shes tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
247b5('bum): phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi
247b6('bum): ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'du byed tshad med do//'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//
247b7('bum): shi ka rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
248a1('bum): pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de
248a2('bum): nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa tshad med do//rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mig tshad med pa'i phyir/byang
248a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper
248a4('bum): na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mig gi tshad kyang dmigs su med de//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mig tshad med do//mig tshad med pa'i phyir//
248a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rna ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
248a6('bum): na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med
248a7('bum): nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rna ba tshad med do//rna ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka sna tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
248b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i chad/
248b2('bum): ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sna tshad med do//sna tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
248b3('bum): med do//kau shi ka lce tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i tshad ni dmigs
248b4('bum): su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lce tshad med do//
248b5('bum): lce tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lus tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
248b6('bum): med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi tshad
248b7('bum): kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lus tshad med do//lus tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka yid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
249a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka/
249a2('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/yid tshad med do//yid
249a3('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
249a4('bum): med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka
249a5('bum): de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/gzugs tshad med do//gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
249a6('bum): tshad med do//kau shi ka sgra tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di///
249a7('bum): ltar sgra'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sgra'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad
249b1('bum): med pa'i phyir/sgra tshad med do//sgra tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka dri chad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
249b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka dwe ni 'di ltar dri'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi
249b3('bum): ka de bzhin du dri'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dri chad med do//dri tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka ro tshad med pa'i
249b4('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta
249b5('bum): ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du ngo'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ro tshad med do//ro tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab
249b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka reg tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
249b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar reg gi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du reg gi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha'
250a1('bum): chad med pa'i phyir/reg chad med de//reg chad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka chos tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
250a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper
250a3('bum): na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du chos kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/chos tshad med do//chos tshad med pa'i
250a4('bum): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
250a5('bum): pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs
250a6('bum): su med do//kau sha~M kA de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ched kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mig gi rnam par shes pa tshad med do//mig gi rnam par
250a7('bum): shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
250b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su
250b2('bum): med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshad med
250b3('bum): pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med
250b4('bum): pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du
250b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
250b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau/
250b7('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
251a1('bum): chad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
251a2('bum): tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir
251a3('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi
251a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi
251a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i
251a6('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shri ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi
251a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
251b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
251b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
251b3('bum): chad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad
251b4('bum): med do//kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
251b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang
251b6('bum): dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi
251b7('bum): ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te
252a1('bum): reg pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang dmigs
252a2('bum): su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lho'i
252a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg
252a4('bum): pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i ched kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha'
252a5('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir
252a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi
252a7('bum): ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lus kyi 'dus
252b1('bum): te reg pa tshad med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
252b2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na//
252b3('bum): nam mkha' tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad med do//
252b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
252b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
252b6('bum): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shri ka de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i
252b7('bum): phyir/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rna
253a1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir
253a2('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de
253a3('bum): bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med do//rna ba'i
253a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
253a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do///
253a6('bum): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//ko shi ka de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med
253a7('bum): pa'i phyir/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka
253b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
253b2('bum): 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg
253b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba tshad med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ched
253b4('bum): med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
253b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i
253b6('bum): tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
253b7('bum): gyis tshor ba tshad med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
254a1('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi
254a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg
254a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
254a4('bum): tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya bcu drug pa//kau shi
254a5('bum): ka sa'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i
254a6('bum): khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sa'i khamos kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam
254a7('bum): mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sa'i khams tshad med do//sa'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka chu'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang
254b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chud med paste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka di
254b2('bum): lha ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du chu'i khams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/chu'i khams tshad med do//
254b3('bum): chu'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med de//kau shi ka ma'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
254b4('bum): pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar me'i khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shau ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med
254b5('bum): do//kau shi ka de bzhin du me'i khams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/me'i khams tshad med do//mi'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
254b6('bum): byin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rlung gi khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
254b7('bum): do ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rlung gi khams kyi tshad kyang dmigs
255a1('bum): su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rlung gi khams tshad med do//rlung gi khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi
255a2('bum): ka nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
255a3('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su
255a4('bum): med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/nam mkha'i khams tshad med do//nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rnam par
255a5('bum): shes pa'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes
255a6('bum): pa'i khams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ched kyang dmigs
255a7('bum): su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//
255b1('bum): kau shI ka ma rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i chad
255b2('bum): ni dmigs su med do//kau sha~M ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du ma rig pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/
255b3('bum): ma rig pa tshad med do//ma rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
255b4('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs
255b5('bum): su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'du byed tshad med do//'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
255b6('bum): patshad med do//kau shI ka rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
255b7('bum): ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang dmigs
256a1('bum): su med de/nam mkha' chad med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa tshad med do//rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//ko
256a2('bum): shi ka ming dang gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ming dang
256a3('bum): gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du ming dang gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam
256a4('bum): mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ming dang gzugs tshad med do//ming dang gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka skye mched drug tshad med pa'i phyir//
256a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di
256a6('bum): lnga ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du skye mched drug gi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/skye mched drug tshad med do//skye
256a7('bum): mched drug tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
256b1('bum): tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i chud ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta skyo dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka bzhin/
256b2('bum): du reg pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/reg pa tshad med do//reg pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka tshor ba tshad
256b3('bum): med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tsher ba'i tshad ni dmigs su
256b4('bum): med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shau ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/tshor ba tshad med
256b5('bum): do//tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka sred pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
256b6('bum): tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sred pa'i
256b7('bum): tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sred pa tshad med do//srid pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka len pa tshad med pa'i phyir
257a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lon pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
257a2('bum): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du len pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/len pa tshad med do//
257a3('bum): len pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka srid pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
257a4('bum): 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de
257a5('bum): bzhin du srid pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/srid pa tshad med do//srid pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka/
257a6('bum): skye ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i tshad ni dmigs
257a7('bum): su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du skye ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/skye ba
257b1('bum): tshad med do//skye ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rga shi tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu//
257b2('bum): phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i chad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau
257b3('bum): shi ka de bzhin du rga shi'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rga shi tshad med do//rga shi tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//
257b4('bum): kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
257b5('bum): ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shri ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
257b6('bum): tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
257b7('bum): pa tshad med do//kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
258a1('bum): na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
258a2('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//tshul khrims
258a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
258a4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste
258a5('bum): dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/bzod pa'i
258a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med
258a7('bum): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
258b1('bum): phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su
258b2('bum): med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do///
258b3('bum): kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
258b4('bum): 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol
258b5('bum): tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes
258b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad myed do//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med
258b7('bum): pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau
259a1('bum): shi ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' chad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//shes/
259a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
259a3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shI ka 'di lta ste dper na/
259a4('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid tshad med do//nang stong
259a5('bum): pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
259a6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med
259a7('bum): do/kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/phyi stong pa nyid tshad med do//phyi stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi
259b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shri kA byi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
259b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad
259b3('bum): kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka
259b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa
259b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/
259b6('bum): nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid
259b7('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs
260a1('bum): su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad
260a2('bum): med pa'i phyir/chen po stong pa nyid tshad med do//chen po stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/
260a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//
260a4('bum): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/don dam
260a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid tshad med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
260a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau/
260a7('bum): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'dus
260b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid chad med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
260b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka
260b3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'dus ma byas
260b4('bum): stong pa nyid tshad med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang
260b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do///
260b6('bum): kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/
260b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/
261a1('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang
261a2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi kau de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
261a3('bum): tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chad med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab
261a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/
261a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka dri
261a6('bum): bzhin du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/
261a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/
261b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi kra 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rang
261b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
261b3('bum): phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
261b4('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du chos thams
261b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab
261b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de
261b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin
262a1('bum): du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
262a2('bum): nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
262a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni
262a4('bum): dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi tshod kyang dmigs su myed de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med do//mi
262a5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262a6('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na//
262a7('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med
262b1('bum): do|dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262b2('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i
262b3('bum): tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa
262b4('bum): nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
262b5('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshod ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper
262b6('bum): na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dngos po med
262b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med
263a1('bum): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag
263a2('bum): pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi tshad kyang
263a3('bum): dmigs su med de//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med
263a4('bum): do//kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
263a5('bum): 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba
263a6('bum): rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/yang dag par spong ba tshad med do//yang dag par spong ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263a7('bum): tshad med do//kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
263b1('bum): doni 'di ltar du 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams kyi tshad nod mogs su med do//gshi ka 'di lta ste dbyer na/nam mtha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//sha~M kr-i do byizhon du rdzu 'phrul gyi rlung ba rnam
263b2('bum): tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka
263b3('bum): dbang po tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs
263b4('bum): su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nAm mkha'i chad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du dbang po rnams kyi ched kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/
263b5('bum): dbang po tshad med do//dbang po tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka stobs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
263b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di chad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau sh+lo ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
263b7('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du stobs rnams kyi ched kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/stobs tshad med do//stobs tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad
264a1('bum): med do//kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i
264a2('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du byang
264a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med do//byang chub kyi yan lag tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab
264a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad
264a5('bum): med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med
264a6('bum): do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med do//
264a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
264b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka
264b2('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/'phags
264b3('bum): pa'i bden pa tshad med do//'phags pa'i bden pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka bsam gtan tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
264b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta
264b5('bum): ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/bsam gtan tshad
264b6('bum): med do//bsam gtan tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka byams pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
264b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med
265a1('bum): do//kau shi ka de bzhin du byams pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/byams pa tshad med do//byams pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes
265a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir
265a3('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shau ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du snying rje'i tshad kyang dmigs su
265a4('bum): med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/snying rje tshad med do//snying rje tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med de/kau shi ka dga' ba tshad med pa'i phyir/byang
265a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dga' ba'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta
265a6('bum): ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du dga' ba'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/dga' ba tshad med do//dga' ba
265a7('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
265b1('bum): tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar btang snyoms kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de
265b2('bum): bzhin du btang snyoms kyi tshod kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/btang snyoms tshad med do//btang snyoms tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
265b3('bum): tshad med do//kau shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir
265b4('bum): zhe na/ko shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka
265b5('bum): de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do//gzugs
265b6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265b7('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na//
266a1('bum): nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rnam par thar
266a2('bum): pa tshad med do//rnam par thar pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
266a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad ni
266a4('bum): dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang
266a5('bum): dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad med pa'i phyir//
266a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i tshad
266b1('bum): ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shr-i ka de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon/
266b2('bum): pa med pa'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang //mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa tshad med do//rnam par thar pa'i
266b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
