266b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi
266b5('bum): ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mngon
266b6('bum): par shes pa tshad med do//mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
266b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam
267a1('bum): mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ting nge 'dzin tshad med do//
267a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
267a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su
267a4('bum): med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/gzungs kyi sgo tshad med do//gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/shes
267a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
267a6('bum): tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni
267a7('bum): dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
267b1('bum): chang med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan///
267b2('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni
267b3('bum): dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/mi 'jigs pa tshad med do//mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa'i
267b4('bum): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chad
267b5('bum): med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//
267b6('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med do//so so yang dag par rig pa
267b7('bum): tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka snying rje chen po tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
268a1('bum): tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' tshad ni dmigs su
268a2('bum): med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/snying rje chen po tshad med do//snying rje chen po tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab
268a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa
268a4('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do///
268a5('bum): kau shi ka de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa tshad med do//sangs rgyas kyi
268a6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268a7('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i
268b1('bum): tshang ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med do//thams cad
268b2('bum): shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268b3('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam
268b4('bum): mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
268b5('bum): tshad med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub
268b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med
268b7('bum): do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med de/nam mkha' tshad med
269a1('bum): pa'i phyir/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chod med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi
269a2('bum): ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o///
269a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya bcu bdun pa//kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
269a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
269a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'du shes
269a6('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi
269a7('bum): mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i
269b1('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi kA de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi kra rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269b2('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig mtha' yas pa'i
269b3('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi mtha' dang dbus mi
269b4('bum): dmigs so//kau shi ka rna ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
269b5('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sna mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
269b6('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lce mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
269b7('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
270a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//
270a2('bum): kau shi ka yid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid
270a3('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
270a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sgra mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
270a5('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dri mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
270a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shau ka ro
270a7('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang
270b1('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka reg mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
270b2('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus myi dmigs so//kau shi ka chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
270b3('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byung
270b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi
270b5('bum): dmigs so//kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir
270b6('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//ko shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
270b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lce'i rnam par
271a1('bum): shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau sho ka de na 'dra
271a2('bum): ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shI ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
271a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shri ka yid kyi rnam par shes
271a4('bum): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes
271a5('bum): pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
271a6('bum): pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub
271a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs
271b1('bum): so//kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
271b2('bum): ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shI ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
271b3('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
271b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so///
271b5('bum): kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka/
271b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
271b7('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//
272a1('bum): kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
272a2('bum): yiyas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te rnyog pa'i rkyen gyis tshar
272a3('bum): ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka nga ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te
272a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
272a5('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka
272a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mthu' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
272a7('bum): kau shi ka do ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub
272b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kA ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus
272b2('bum): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
272b3('bum): 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmis so//kau shi ka chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
272b4('bum): yas nga ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka me'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
272b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar me'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rlung gi khams mtha'
272b6('bum): yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi mtha' dang
272b7('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i
273a1('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
273a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi
273a3('bum): dmigs so//kau shi ka ma rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
273a4('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
273a5('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
273a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka
273a7('bum): ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
273b1('bum): ming dang gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
273b2('bum): mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
273b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshor ba mtha'
273b4('bum): yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus
273b5('bum): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
273b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka len pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
273b7('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka srid pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274a1('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mthu' drang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka skyeng
274a2('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha'
274a3('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rga shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
274a4('bum): na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274a5('bum): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ko de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshul
274a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
274a7('bum): 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi kra brtson
274b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
274b3('bum): ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274b4('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtho' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka shes
274b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
274b6('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
274b7('bum): tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang
275a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi//
275a2('bum): dmigs so//kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
275a3('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
275a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid mtha'
275a5('bum): yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha'
275a6('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de
275a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
275b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka di ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau sho ka 'dus ma byu/
275b2('bum): stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
275b3('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
275b4('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i
275b5('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha'
275b6('bum): dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de
275b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
276a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mo dmigs so//kau
276a2('bum): shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276a3('bum): shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276a4('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mi
276a5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
276a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
276a7('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa
276b1('bum): nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
276b2('bum): mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
276b3('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
276b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus
276b5('bum): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
276b6('bum): kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
276b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i
277a1('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams
277a2('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i
277a3('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
277a4('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka deni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'phags
277a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
277a6('bum): 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a7('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka
277b1('bum): bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka dr-i ni 'di ltar bsam gtan
277b2('bum): rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de
277b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems
277b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang
277b5('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i
277b6('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
277b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
278a1('bum): pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
278a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
278a3('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278a4('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau she ka ting
278a5('bum): nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
278a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
278a7('bum): 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas
278b1('bum): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau sho ka do ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams//
278b2('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de
278b3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shri ka so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
278b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so///
278b5('bum): kau shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
278b6('bum): byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
278b7('bum): yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ko shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub
279a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
279a2('bum): kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
279a3('bum): pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shI ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
279a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang
279a5('bum): dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas
279a6('bum): pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa'
279a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /'du shes mtha' yas pa dang /'du byed mtha' yas pa dang //
279b1('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /mig mtha' yas pa dang /rna ba mtha' yas pa dang /sna mtha' yas pa dang /lce mtha' yas pa dang /lus mtha' yas pa dang /yid mtha'i/
279b2('bum): yas pa dang /gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /sgra mtha' yas pa dang /dri mtha' yas pa dang /ro mtha' yas pa dang /reg mtha' yas pa dang /chos mtha' yas pa dang /mig
279b3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /
279b4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /
279b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /mig
279b6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /
279b7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' yas
280a1('bum): pa dang /sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /mo'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang /nam
280a2('bum): mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang /'du byed mtha' yas pa dang /rnam par shes pa
280a3('bum): mtha' yas pa dang /ming dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang /reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /sred pa mtha'
280a4('bum): yas pa dang /len pa mtha' yas pa dang /srid pa mtha' yas pa dang /skye ba mtha' yas pa dang /rga shi mtha' yas pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas
280a5('bum): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /
280a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /phye stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa
280a7('bum): dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang //
280b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtha'
280b2('bum): yas pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
280b3('bum): mtha' yas pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngos
280b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' yas pa
280b5('bum): dang /dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang /stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha'
280b6('bum): yas pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang /tshad med pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
280b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha' yas pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i
281a1('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mtha' yas pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha'
281a2('bum): yas pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' yas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang /so so
281a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang /byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang /snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtha'
281a4('bum): yas pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /dgra
281a5('bum): bcom pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i
281a6('bum): phyir mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
281a7('bum): po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na
281b1('bum): dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nas bya
281b2('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha'
281b3('bum): yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha
281b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na chos dmigs pa mtha' yas
281b5('bum): pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis
281b6('bum): smras pa/kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab
281b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/
282a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems
282a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka do ni 'di ltar de
282a3('bum): bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir dmigs pa mtha' yas so//dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so//kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i
282a4('bum): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so//kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'
282a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
282a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/'di lta ste sems can
282a7('bum): sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang
282b1('bum): ma yin te/'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/dngos po med par ming du btags pa/dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o//rab 'byor
282b2('bum): gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni
282b3('bum): med do//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la/sems can mtha' yas pa ci zhig yod de/kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs
282b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/de
282b5('bum): la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ba yod dam/smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//
282b6('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//de nas dbang po dang
282b7('bum): bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcos pa'i lha rnams dang /skyes pa dang bud med du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du
283a1('bum): brjod pa ched du brjod do gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /de bzhin
283a2('bum): gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do//kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do//kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par
283a3('bum): bshad do//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du
283a4('bum): gzung bar bgyi'o//chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gam/rna ba
283a5('bum): 'am/sna 'am/lce 'am/lus sam/yid dam/gzugs sam/sgra 'am/dri 'am/ro 'am/reg gam/chos sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
283a6('bum): 'am/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/rna ba'i 'dus
283a7('bum): te reg pa 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
283b1('bum): 'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
283b2('bum): tshor ba 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sa'i khams sam/chu'i khams sam/me'i khams sam/rlung gi khams sam/nam mkha'i khams sam/rnam
283b3('bum): par shes pa'i khams sam/ma rig pa 'am/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/ming drang gzugs sam/skye mched drug gam/reg pa 'am/tshor ba 'am/sred pa 'am/
283b4('bum): len pa 'am/srid pa 'am/skye ba 'am/rga shi 'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi
283b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid
283b6('bum): stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma
283b7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/rang bzhin stong po nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi migs pa stong pa nyid
284a1('bum): dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par
284a2('bum): spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/
284a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams
284a4('bum): sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa
284a5('bum): rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa
284a6('bum): rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
284a7('bum): 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/thams cad shes pa nyid dam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
284b1('bum): pa nyid dam/chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
284b2('bum): theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//
284b3('bum): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/de ltar chos gang yang dmigs su med de/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gam/rna ba 'am/
284b4('bum): sna 'am/lce 'am/lus sam/yid dam/gzugs sam/sgra 'am/dri'am/ro 'am/reg gam/chos sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/
284b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/
284b6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'amA/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/rna ba'i 'dus
284b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/
285a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/sa'i khams sam/chu'i khams sam/me'i khams sam/rlung gi khams sam/nam mkha'i khams sam/rnam
285a2('bum): par shes pa'i khams sam/ma rig pa 'am/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/ming dang gzugs sam/skye mched drug gam/reg pa'am/tshor ba'am/sred pa 'am/
285a3('bum): len pa 'am/srid pa 'am/skye ba 'am/rga shi'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus
285a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong
285a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/
285a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam//
285a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam//
285b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag/
285b2('bum): brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa
285b3('bum): rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams
285b4('bum): sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/
285b5('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong
285b6('bum): bo'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi/theg pa
285b7('bum): gsum rnam par dgod pa'ang yod de/gsum gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//lha'i
286a1('bum): bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
286a2('bum): du gzung bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/gsum gang zhe na/'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
286a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
286a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
286a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du rang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
286a6('bum): so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhin du 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//phyi stong
286a7('bum): pa nyid las gnan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ma dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du 'ang
286b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi
286b2('bum): dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
286b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so///
286b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//chos thams cad
286b5('bum): stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa
286b6('bum): nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan
286b7('bum): du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa me dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las
287a1('bum): gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
287a2('bum): rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//dbang po rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
287a3('bum): gshegs pa mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gzhan du'ang
287a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//bsam gtan rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
287a5('bum): gshegs pa mi dmigs so//tshad med pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du'ang
287a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
287a7('bum): las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs
287b1('bum): pa mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmyigs so//gzungs
287b2('bum): kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa
287b3('bum): rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po las gzhan
287b4('bum): du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du'ang de bzhin
287b5('bum): gshegs pa mi dmigs so//thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa
287b6('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
287b7('bum): bam po brgya bco brgyad pa//lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//tshul khrims kyi pha
288a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//shes /
288a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//nang stong pa nyid la slob bo//phyi stong pa nyid la slob bo//phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo//
288a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo//'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
288a4('bum): la slob bo//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//mi dmigs pa
288a5('bum): stong pa nyid la slob bo//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob bo//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
288a6('bum): slob bo//yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo//dbang po rnams la slob bo//stobs rnams la slob bo//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob
288a7('bum): bo|'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po la slob bo//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo//bsam gtan rnams la slob bo//tshad med pa rnams la slob bo//gzugs
288b1('bum): mod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo//rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
288b2('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la slob bo//mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo//ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo//de bzhin gshegs/
288b3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la slob bo//mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob bo//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo//byams pa chen po la slob bo//snying rje chen po la slob bo//sangs
288b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo//dgra bcom
288b5('bum): pa nyid la slob bo//rang byang chub la slob bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo//lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
288b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar spyod pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
288b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham ring byed cing /rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong 'dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
289a1('bum): pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//brtson 'grus kyi pha
289a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//nang stong pa nyid dang
289a3('bum): bral bar ma gyur to//phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//chen po stong
289a4('bum): pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral
289a5('bum): bar ma gyur to//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar
289a6('bum): ma gyur to//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//mi
289a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//dngos po med pa'i
289b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
289b2('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to//dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//'phags
289b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//tshad med pa rnams
289b4('bum): dang bral bar ma gyur to//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
289b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//mngon par shes pa
289b6('bum): rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur
289b7('bum): tod mi 'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to//byams pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to//snying rje chen po dang bral
290a1('bum): bar ma gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur te/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag dang
290a2('bum): yang bral bar ma gyur to//lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i
290a3('bum): dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na/bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
290a4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul po kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
290a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
290a6('bum): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshor ba mi
290a7('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'du shes mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa me len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mig mi len
290b1('bum): memi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rna ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sna mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lha mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lus ma len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /yid ma lan ma
290b2('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang /gzugs mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sgra mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /dri mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rom len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /reg mi len
290b3('bum): mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /chos mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /snal
290b4('bum): rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lho'i rnam par shes pa ma len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi
290b5('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang //
290b6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te
290b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi
291a1('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
291a2('bum): dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sa'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /chu'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /me'i
291a3('bum): khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rlung gi khams me len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /nam mkha'i khams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams me len mi
291a4('bum): 'dor ba'i tshul dang /ma rig pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'du byed mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /ming dang gzugs mi
291a5('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /skye mched drug mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /reg pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshor ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sred pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
291a6('bum): tshul dang /len pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /srid pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /skye ba mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rga shi mI len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /sbyin pa'i
291a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /
291b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i
291b2('bum): tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid me leni ma 'dor ba'i tshul dang /phyi stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi
291b3('bum): len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi leni mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
291b4('bum): dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i
291b5('bum): tshul dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rang gi
291b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
291b7('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /yang dag par spong ba
292a1('bum): rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /dbang po rnams mI len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /stobs rnams
292a2('bum): mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i
292a3('bum): bden pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /bsam gtan rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshad med pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
292a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi len mi 'dor
292a5('bum): ba'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i
292a6('bum): tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i
292a7('bum): tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi leni mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /byams pa chen po me len mi 'dor ba'i tshul
292b1('bum): rdzu jug na na na du du rdzu ma rdu sa du nas tu rna rdzun
292b2('bum): na pa nyid ldan par 'dus su na myu sa NUs/de slong dang/dag ma ma dang / da

292b4('bum): du/ rgyu nga/ / d+ha 'i ltu bye nga/da rgyu bdang/
293a1('bum): lha'i bu dang /mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen
293a2('bum): nas/de dag thams cad dbang du btsugs te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong
293a3('bum): ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
293a4('bum): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /bsgom pa dang /gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
293a5('bum): kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba de dag ni/bdud sdig can dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /
293a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/tsher ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/'du shes stong pa nyid shin

293b1('bum): phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//
293b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/mig stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rna ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/sna stong
293b3('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lce stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lus stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/yid stong pa nyid shin tu
293b4('bum): byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med
293b5('bum): pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/sgra stong pa nyid
293b6('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/dri stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ro stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/reg stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
293b7('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/chos stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas
294a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//dri ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/mig gi///
294a2('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
294a3('bum): shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis
294a4('bum): brlabs par 'gyur/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags

294a7('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
294b1('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis///

294b3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin
294b4('bum): gyis brlabs par 'gyur/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid shin

294b6('bum): pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la blugs mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags
294b7('bum): mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/sa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par
295a1('bum): 'gyur/chu'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/me'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rlung gi khams stong pa nyid shon
295a2('bum): tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par

295a4('bum): pa la blags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ma rig pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu

295b1('bum): par 'gyur/skye ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/rga shi stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis
295b2('bum): stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
295b3('bum): bu mo de dag gis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/
295b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/bsam gtan
295b5('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
295b6('bum): ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs
295b7('bum): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/phye stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/phyi nang
296a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/chen po stong pa nyid stong pa
