332b4('bum): par thar pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams sgom mo snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//mthar
332b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom mo snyam na'ang de bdag tu
332b6('bum): bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom pa'i tshe/'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag
332b7('bum): ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom mo snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//mngon
333a1('bum): par shes pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams sgrom mo snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga
333a2('bum): rgyal du 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa'i tshe/'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga
333a3('bum): rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo thams cad thob par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//
333a4('bum): de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di
333a5('bum): snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis
333a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis snying rje chen po
333a7('bum): bsgom par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
333b1('bum): bsgom par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o snyam na'ang
333b2('bum): de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la
333b3('bum): mngon par chags pas nga rgyal du 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam na'ang de bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags
333b4('bum): pas nga rgyal du 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/bdag tu bgyi ba la mngon par chags
333b5('bum): pas nga rgyal du 'gyur te/de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems
333b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du/sbyin pa'ang mi
333b7('bum): dmigs/gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
334a1('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dbu'i sems dpa' chen pa yongs su 'dul ba dang /ngartul ma mchis pa'i slad du lto bar gnas so//de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul
334a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du/tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs
334a3('bum): te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /
334a4('bum): nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de 'jig rten las 'dras pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms
334a5('bum): pa'i slad du/bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
334a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus
334a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du/brtson 'grus su'ang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus dang ldan par yang mi dmigs
334b1('bum): te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal
334b2('bum): ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du//
334b3('bum): bsam gtan du'ang mi dmigs/bsam gtan dang ldan par yang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
334b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
334b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du/shes rab tu'ang mi dmigs/shes rab dang ldan par yang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das
334b6('bum): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du
334b7('bum): nye bar gnas so//de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom
335a1('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu//
335a2('bum): bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de dbang po rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de stobs rnams
335a3('bum): sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu
335a4('bum): bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs
335a5('bum): pa ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis
335a6('bum): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de bsam gtan
335a7('bum): rnams sgo ma yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de tshad med pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms
335b1('bum): pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis//
335b2('bum): de rnam par thar pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
335b3('bum): sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom
335b4('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de mngon par shes pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i
335b5('bum): slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom yang
335b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
335b7('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu
336a1('bum): bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis//
336a2('bum): de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de byams pa chen po sgom yang shes rab kyi pha
336a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de snying rje chen po sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis//
336a4('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha
336a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//de thams cad shes pa nyid sgom yang
336a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i
336a7('bum): slad du dmigs pa ma mchis/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i slad du dmigs pa ma mchis te/bcom
336b1('bum): ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su 'dul ba dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//
336b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u bcu bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka'
336b3('bum): stsal to//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /kha ton du byed cing
336b4('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa zhig 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug cing g.yul ngor chas pa'i tshe/der gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
336b5('bum): kha ton du byas nas song ste 'dug na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'pham par mi 'gyur te/gdon mi za bar rgyal bar 'gyur ro//rgyal nas ma smras ma nyams par 'thab mo
336b6('bum): de las 'thor bar 'gyur te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di kha ton du byed cing /g.yul der song song ba las srog gi bar chad
336b7('bum): du 'gyur ba ni mi srid de/gnas med skabs med do//gal te de'i lus la la la zhig gis mda' 'phangs sam/mtshon gyis btab na lus la phog cing 'jug par mi 'gyur ro//de
337a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des yun ring por pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten/shes rab kyi/
337a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsgoms te/bdag gi 'dod chags kyi mtshon dang /'dod chags kyi mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi 'dod chags kyi mtshon dang /'dod chags kyi mda'
337a3('bum): yang bcom/bdag gi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang /zhe sdang gi mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi zhe sdang gi mtshon dang /zhe sdang gi mda' yang bcom/bdag gi gti mug gi mtshon dang /gti
337a4('bum): mug gi mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi gti mug gi mtshon dang /gti mug gi mda' yang bcom/bdag gi lta ba'i rnam pa'i mtshon dang /mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi lta ba'i rnam
337a5('bum): pa'i mtshon dang /mda' yang bcom/bdag gi kun nas ldang ba'i mtshon dang /mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi kun nas ldang ba'i mtshan dang /mda' yang bcom/bdag gi bag la
337a6('bum): nyal ba'i mtshan dang mda' yang bcom/gzhan gyi bag la nyal ba'i mtshon dang mnga' yang bcom pa'i phyir te/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
337a7('bum): g.yul du phyin pa'i tshe/lus la mtshon nam mdas phog cing zug par mi 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
337b1('bum): mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang mi 'bral na/de la la la zhig gis dug
337b2('bum): gis gtor ram/byud byas sam/me'i 'obs su brjod dam/mtshon gyis btab bam/dug blud dam/chur bor yang rung ste/de dag thams cad kyis de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro///
337b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o//kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags bla na med pa'o//
337b4('bum): kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags gong na med pa ste/rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la'ang gnod par mi byed//
337b5('bum): gzhan la'ang gnod par mi byed/gnyis ka la'ang gnod par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de 'di la slob pa'i tshe/bdag mi dmigs/sems can mi dmigs/srog
337b6('bum): mi dmigs/'gro ba mi dmigs/gso ba mi dmigs/skyes bu mi dmigs/gang zag mi dmigs/shed can mi dmigs/shed bdag mi dmigs/byed pa po mi dmigs//
337b7('bum): tshor ba po mi dmigs/shes pa po mi dmigs/mthong ba po mi dmigs so//gzugs mi dmigs/tshor ba mi dmigs/'du shes mi dmigs/'du byed mi dmigs/rnam par
338a1('bum): shes pa mi dmigs so//mig mi dmigs/rna ba mo dmigs/sna mi dmigs/lho mo dmigs/lus mI dmigs/yid mi dmigs so//gzugs mi dmigs
338a2('bum): sgra mi dmigs/dri mi dmigs/ro mi dmigs/reg mi dmigs/chos mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/sna'i rnam
338a3('bum): par shes pa mi dmigs/lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs//
338a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi
338a5('bum): dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
338a6('bum): mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
338a7('bum): mi dmigs so//sa'i khams mi dmigs/chu'i khams mi dmigs/me'i khams mi dmigs/rlung gi khams mi dmigs/nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs/rnam par
338b1('bum): shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//ma rig pa mi dmigs/'du byed mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ming dang gzugs mi dmigs/skye mchod drug mi dmigs/reg
338b2('bum): pa mi dmigs/tshor ba mi dmigs/sred pa mi dmigs/len pa mi dmigs/srid pa mi dmigs/skye ba mi dmigs/rga shi mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/
338b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
338b4('bum): dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi
338b5('bum): dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/mtha' las 'dras
338b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid
338b7('bum): mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dngos
339a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
339a2('bum): mi dmigs/dbang po rnams mi dmigs/stobs rnams mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs//
339a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs/bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs/tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs//
339a4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
339a5('bum): pa med pa mi dmigs/mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs/ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
339a6('bum): rnams mi dmigs/mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs/byams pa chen po mi dmigs/snying rje chen po mi dmigs//
339a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
339b1('bum): bu mi dmigs/dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs/rang byang chub mi dmigs/thams cad shes pa nyid mi dmigs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad/
339b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//de ltar mi dmigs pas na/bdag la'ang gnod par mi byed/gzhan la'ang gnod par mi byed/gnyis ka la'ang gnod par mi byed de/des bla
339b3('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing /sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
339b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /rig sngags 'di nyid la bslabs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
339b5('bum): parare sangs rgyas so//gang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la bslab cing /bla na med pa yang dag par
339b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//gang da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
339b7('bum): rgyas tshad medo grangs med pa de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la bslabs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kau shi ka
340a1('bum): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba ma byas/kha ton ma byas/klag pa dang /kun chub par ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas kyang /grang na
340a2('bum): bris shing /'chang ba'i khyim mam/grong ngam/grong rdal lam/grong khyer der mi 'am/mi ma yin pa glags lta bas glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar
340a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu
340a4('bum): dang /mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang /'phrul dwaga'i lha'i bu dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs lha nye phan
340a5('bum): gyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang /snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung snang gi lha'i bu dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /kun snang dang
340a6('bum): ba'i lha'i bu dang /dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung dge'i lha'i bu dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang /che ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung che'i lha'i bu dang /tshad med che
340a7('bum): ba'i lha'i bu dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang /mi che ba'i lha'i bu dang /mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi
340b1('bum): lha'i bu dang /'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang /mtsho ma'i lha'i bu dang /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang /
340b2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang /chings chen
340b3('bum): lha'i bu dang /snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung snang gi lha'i bu dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang /dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung dge'i lha'i bu dang /tshad
340b4('bum): med dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang /che ba'i lha'i bu dang /chung che'i lha'i bu dang /tshad med che ba'i lha'i bu dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang /mi che ba'i lha'i
340b5('bum): bu dang /mi gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
340b6('bum): gigres shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing bcangs pa de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /bskyang ba byed de/lha'i bu de dag 'ongs nas kyang
340b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /pu dud dang /mchod pa byas shing 'dong bar 'gyur te/kau shi ka de lhor gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
341a1('bum): phyin pa 'di bris te bcangs na/de la'ang tshe 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa de dag yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/snying po byang chub pa'am/
341a2('bum): snying po byang chub kyi 'khor ram/snying po byang chub kyi nang na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sam mir gyur pa gang su 'dug kyang rung ste/de dag la mi 'am/
341a3('bum): mi ma yin pas gtse ba 'am/mtho mtshams par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
341a4('bum): kyang de la bzhugs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//gang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
341a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang de nyid du bzhugs shing /blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//da ltar
341a6('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag kyang de nyid la bzhugs te/bla na
341a7('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams
341b1('bum): cad kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can thams cad 'jigs bya med pa dang /khon med pa dang gzugs/
341b2('bum): med par nan tan mdzad nas/sems can tshad med grangs med pa lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs
341b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//phyir mi
341b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub la bkod
341b5('bum): par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to//bkod do//dgod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/
341b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa'i phyogs de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du byas pas/me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma
341b7('bum): dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan mang pos phyag bya ba dang /'dud pa dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya bar
342a1('bum): gyur to////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/bam po brgya nyer gcig pa//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
342a2('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te/bcangs la de la me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /
342a3('bum): spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa
342a4('bum): bgyis pa dang /gang la las yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
342a5('bum): sku gdung rnams rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten du bstsal te/mchod dam/rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bstsal te/de la me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa
342a6('bum): dang /bye ma dang /na bzo' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dAn mang pos rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa bgyis na/de gnyis las
342a7('bum): gang gi bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na de khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de
342b1('bum): bzhin du lung ston cig/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa
342b2('bum): dang /sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub pa de lam gang la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
342b3('bum): nyid brnyes te/sku 'di lta bu mngon par grub par gyur/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/de bzhin gshegs
342b4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes te/sku 'di lta bu'ang mngon par grub bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
342b5('bum): stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so//sku 'di 'dra
342b6('bum): ba'ang mngon par grub bo//kau shi ka nga'i sku 'di brnyes pas ni/de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su'ang mi 'gro ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
342b7('bum): nyid brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
343a1('bum): byung ngo //kau shi ka de ltar lus 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzhi ste/gzhi de la brten nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
343a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so//de lta bas na sku 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes de'i gzhir gyur pa ste/
343a3('bum): sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya bar gyur te/kau shi ka
343a4('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung mchod pa'ang sku la mchod pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/chos la shin tu mchod par mi 'gyur ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
343a5('bum): gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /me tog dang /
343a6('bum): 'phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gri dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /
343a7('bum): mchod pa byas pas ni des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pas de bzhin
343b1('bum): gshegs pa la mchod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bris te/gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//glag par bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin
343b2('bum): du yid la bya'o//me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /spos dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o//
343b3('bum): bkur stir bya'o//phu dud du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//ko shi ka gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten du bcug
343b4('bum): gam/rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du blugs shing gces par byas te/de la me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /
343b5('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba don mang pos rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byas pa bas/gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/
343b6('bum): gzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang /me tog dang /'phreng ba dang /dri dang /byug pa dang /phye
343b7('bum): ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byas na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams
344a1('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'ang 'di las byung ngo //nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //phyi stong pa nyid kyang //
344a2('bum): 'di las byung ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //chen po stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //don dam pa stong pa
344a3('bum): nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las
344a4('bum): byung ngo //thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //chos
344a5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //dngos po med pa stong
344a6('bum): pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'di las byung ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'ang 'di
344a7('bum): las byung ngo //yang dag par spong ba bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //dbang po lnga'ang 'di las byung ngo //stobs lnga'ang 'di las
344b1('bum): byung ngo //byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang 'di las byung ngo //'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang 'di las byung ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //
344b2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //tshad med pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //rnam par thar pa brgyad
344b3('bum): kyang 'di las byung ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang 'di las byung ngo //rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
344b4('bum): pa'ang 'di las byung ngo //mngon par shes pa lnga'ang 'di las byung ngo //ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //de
344b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang 'di las byung ngo //mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang 'di las byung ngo //byams pa chen
344b6('bum): po'ang 'di las byung ngo //snying rje chen po'ang 'di las byung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'di las byung ngo //sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang 'di
344b7('bum): las byung ngo //sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'di lasu byang ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'di las byung ngo //
345a1('bum): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'di las byung ngo //longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'di las byung ngo //'khor phun sum tshogs pa'adra 'a//
345a2('bum): las byung ngo //byams pa chen po'ang 'di las byung ngo //snying rje chen po'ang 'di las byung ngo //rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'ang 'di las byung ngo //bram ze'i
345a3('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba'ang 'di las byung ngo //khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'ang 'di las byung ngo //rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
345a4('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //'phrul
345a5('bum): dga'i lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
345a6('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
345a7('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //chung snang gi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //kun snang dang ba'i lha
345b1('bum): rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //dge ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //chung dgo'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshad mod dge ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //
345b2('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //chung che'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las
345b3('bum): byung ngo //'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //shin tu mthong
345b4('bum): ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //'og min gyi lha rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'di las
345b5('bum): byung ngo //lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //dgra bcom pa rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //rang sangs rgyas
345b6('bum): rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
345b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di las byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
346a1('bum): kyang 'di las byung ngo //brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling gi mi gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror ma
346a2('bum): bgyid/bkur stir mi bgyid/phu dud du mi bgyid/mchod par mi bgyid pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa de ltar mthu che bar ma 'tshal
346a3('bum): tam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shrI ka de ji snyam du sems/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /
346a4('bum): gang chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /gang dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /gang sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang /gang chos la nem nur
346a5('bum): med pa dang /gang dge 'dun la nem nur med pa dang /gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang /gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang /gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de
346a6('bum): lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling gi mi gang sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /gang chos la mos pa mi
346a7('bum): phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /gang dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /gang sangs rgyas la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /gang chos la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /
346b1('bum): gang dge 'dun la nem nur ma mchis pa dang /gang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa dang /gang chos la shin tu rton pa dang /gang dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo //bcom
346b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/dzam+bu'i gling gi me las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i
346b3('bum): gling gi mi las rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling
346b4('bum): gi mi las mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig/
346b5('bum): yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs
346b6('bum): par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed
346b7('bum): cig yod do/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi
347a1('bum): las bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las rang byang chub tu yang
347a2('bum): dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod//
347a3('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo //de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
347a4('bum): thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob
347a5('bum): pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni chos nyung
347a6('bum): ngo//de bas kyang dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang 'dod chags dang /
347a7('bum): zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i slad du/lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i tshe'i kun tu sbyor ba
347b1('bum): lnga spangs pa'i slad du/phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni
347b2('bum): ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang dzam+bu'i gling gi mi las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang dzim+bu'i gling gi mi las bla na med pa yang dag
347b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/dzam+bu'i
347b4('bum): gling gi me de dag las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /
347b5('bum): sangs rgyas la nem nur med pa dang /chos la nem nur med pa dang /dge 'dun la nem nur med pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang sangs rgyas la shin tu rton pa
347b6('bum): dang /chos la shin tu rton pa dang /dge 'dun la shin tu rton pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches
347b7('bum): nyung ngo //de bas kyang rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang phyir ma 'ong bar
348a1('bum): gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par
348a2('bum): gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang byang chub tu
348a3('bum): spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang /chos ma thos pa dang /dge
348a4('bum): 'dun bsnyen ma bkur ba dang /sbyin pa ma byin pa dang /tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang /bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang /brtson 'grus ma brtsams pa dang /bsam
348a5('bum): gtan ma bsgoms pa dang /shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma
348a6('bum): bsgoms pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgomaso pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
348a7('bum): phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma
348b1('bum): bsgoms pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /don dam pa
348b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma
348b3('bum): thos ma bsgoms pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos
348b4('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma
348b5('bum): thos ma bsgoms pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
348b6('bum): pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
348b7('bum): rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos
349a1('bum): ma bsgoms pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams mthos ma bsgoms pa dang /
349a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /tshad med pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa
349a3('bum): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
349a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams ma
349a5('bum): thos mo bsgoms pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /mi 'jigs pa
349a6('bum): rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /byams pa chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /snying rje chen po
349a7('bum): ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /lam gyi rnam
349b1('bum): bshes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/'di ltar dzam+bu'i gling gi sems
349b2('bum): can las sangs rgyas la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /chos la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /dge 'dun la mos pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/de bas
349b3('bum): kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
349b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu thob pa ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang
349b5('bum): dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug bsrabs

350b1('bum): pa dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la nem nur med pa ni ji snyed cig yod/dzam+bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las mar shes pa dang /par shes pa dang /dge

354b5('bum): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing /bcang ba dang /klog cing kun chub pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas shing bris te/me tog dang /bdug spos
354b6('bum): dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//phu dud
354b7('bum): du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//dge ba'i chos gong ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/de dag kyang gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/klag
355a1('bum): par bya/kun chub par bya/tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
355a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
355a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
355a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus mu byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med
355a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
355a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi
355a7('bum): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
355b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs mod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi drung /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
355b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo
355b3('bum): thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
355b4('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gang ji snyed/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de
355b5('bum): drag kyang gzung por bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//kun chub por bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs
355b6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltararo shes par 'gyur to/de bzhin grwa shegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe'ang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
355b7('bum): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
356a1('bum): dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
356a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
356a3('bum): thog mu dang tha ma me pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa snying po nyid dang /rang bzhin spyong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gri mtshan nyid
356a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran
356a5('bum): po nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
356a6('bum): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
356a7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par
356b1('bum): shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /smyo sau myang drug
356b2('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dang /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
356b3('bum): pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o//sangs
356b4('bum): rgyas kyis chos gzhan tshad med pa'i bar du'ang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/do ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyis bstun pa'o//rang sangs rgyas dang /dgra bcom
356b5('bum): pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa'ang 'di yin te/yid ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes
356b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa da //bAs m+b+ha gton+da gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /bzod pa'i
356b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin po la slob slob pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob po dang /nang stong pa nyid la slob slob
357a1('bum): pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la sgrib slob pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob skro pa dang /rkyen dra/
357a2('bum): stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /don dram pa stong pa nyid la slob slob po dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob
357a3('bum): pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma mod pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa
357a4('bum): dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob skyob pa dang /rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /mi dmigs
357a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
357a6('bum): nyid la slob slob pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob
357a7('bum): slob pa dang /dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang /stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
357b1('bum): lag brgyad pa la skyob slob pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang /chud med pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /
357b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams la skyob slob pa dang /mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob
357b3('bum): pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la slob slob pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
357b4('bum): rnams la slob slob pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang //
357b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /byams pa chen po la slob slob pa dang /snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi cho snga ma 'dres pa rnamasngal
357b6('bum): slob slob pa dang /thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob po dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i
357b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
358a1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//pha rol tu phyin to//pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro//
358a2('bum): kau shi ka de bas nA rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /de bzhin go shegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung
358a3('bum): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang /rang sangs
358a4('bum): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis
358a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /
358a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bAr gyi rten yin no//de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha
358a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
358b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te//lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
358b2('bum): nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
358b3('bum): po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lho dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bor gyi rten yin no//de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/
358b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
358b5('bum): kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
358b6('bum): kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rton yin te/lce dang //
358b7('bum): mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skyong dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis nong stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos
359a1('bum): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin gyi
359a2('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/dri ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs
359a3('bum): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang /mi dang /lho ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag
359a4('bum): gos phyi nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
359a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang /mi dang /lha mo yin gyi skye dbu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten
359a6('bum): pApar bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dri ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
359a7('bum): kyi rten yin te/lho dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
359b1('bum): ts+tshanu ba stong pa nyid 'di ninyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams nAd kyi dz+nyAn yin te/lha dra m+b+hi dang lha mdza//
359b2('bum): gyiste dbu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis don ngom pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shikadon dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni sbyin sa
359b3('bum): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//
359b4('bum): de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
359b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rnon yin te/skye dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong po nyid la brten
359b6('bum): par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po thams
359b7('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dbu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
360a1('bum): kau shi ka mAtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid 'dri ni nyanu thom+b+ha dang /ra sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams/
360a2('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dad lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar byi rten yin no//de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir
360a3('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'dri ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
360a4('bum): rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
360a5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang
360a6('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis rang bzhin stong po nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kra rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan
360a7('bum): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de
360b1('bum): dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /
360b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid
360b3('bum): stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
360b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brten par
360b5('bum): bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
360b6('bum): cod kyi rten yin to//lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
360b7('bum): shi ka dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang /
361a1('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka ngo bo nyid
361a2('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin to/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi
361a3('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kr-i shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
361a4('bum): stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po thums cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin
361a5('bum): gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa 'di dag ni
361a6('bum): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yon te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar
361a7('bum): gyi rten yin no//de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /
361b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis
361b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'dri dag ni nyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
361b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis dbang po rnams la brton par bya ste/de
361b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shrI ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha
361b5('bum): dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang //
361b6('bum): rlung sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lho dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag
361b7('bum): gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang
362a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad k+Shi rten yin to//lha dang mo dang lha ma yin gyi skyo dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis
362a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /
362a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de
