362a5('bum): rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis
362a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
362a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin to/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis tshad med pa rnams la brten par
362b1('bum): bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shI ka chud med pa 'di dag nI nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
362b2('bum): rten+da yin te/lha dang myi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/
362b3('bum): do ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
362b4('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang /mi dang /lha mya yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/
362b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
362b6('bum): yin+da te/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de
362b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
363a1('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
363a2('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
363a3('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'di dag ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/
363a4('bum): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
363a5('bum): mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te//
363a6('bum): lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin/
363a7('bum): 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin gyi
363b1('bum): skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi klu gzungs kyi sgro 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang //
363b2('bum): slongs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams tsA dak+Shi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag
363b3('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni/nyan thos dang /rang
363b4('bum): srangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams rgyud kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi drang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag
363b5('bum): gis mi 'jigs pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka mi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub
363b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams tsud kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis so so yang dag par
363b7('bum): rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
364a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thamasna ca kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis snying rje chen
364a2('bum): po la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kra snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
364a3('bum): po thams cad kyi N+Di na yin te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brten
364a4('bum): par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chosam 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
364a5('bum): dpa'i chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha drang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de
364a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kr-i shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten
364a7('bum): yin to/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis lom gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi
364b1('bum): ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dri ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chun po thams cad kyi rten yin te/lha dang mi dang
364b2('bum): lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
364b3('bum): pa nyid 'di ni nyon thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yon te/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i
364b4('bum): bar gyi rten yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgyu nyer gnyis pa//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
364b5('bum): zhig gis/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad
364b6('bum): phyed pa byas te/de la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas
364b7('bum): kyi phye mo dang /lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi
365a1('bum): sil snun mang pos rim gror byas/bkur+ya stir byas/phudud du byas/mchod par byas na/kau shi kA do la dri snyam du soms/draru d+hA /
365a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bstod nams mang du 'brel lom/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bad bar ga shegs pa mang
365a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shI ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rogs kyi bu mo/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang
365a4('bum): 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
365a5('bum): nyid kyi sems drung mi 'bral la/grong du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshon dang /
365a6('bum): ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed na/bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi
365a7('bum): ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi/kau shi ka gal te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gos/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
365b1('bum): 'das nas/mchod pa'i phyir 'jom+bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/
365b2('bum): de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi
365b3('bum): chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba ngan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror
365b4('bum): byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang
365b5('bum): du 'phel lam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de
365b6('bum): bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang
365b7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral la/gong du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug po dang /phye
366a1('bum): ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud
366a2('bum): du byed/mchod par byed na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kro shi ka 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog
366a3('bum): gr-i/kau shri ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/mchod pa'i phyir
366a4('bum): gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang
366a5('bum): ste/de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rjes kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha
366a6('bum): rdzas kyi chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sol snyan mang
366a7('bum): pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
366b1('bum): mang du 'phel lam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka
366b2('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun
366b3('bum): chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /brisa? shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs
366b4('bum): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed na/de'i bsod nams
366b5('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/kau shi ka gral te
366b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
366b7('bum): byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/de dag la nam 'tshe'i bar du lha
367a1('bum): rdzas kyi me tog dang /b+hU rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spros dang /wA rdzas kyi rtsug pa dang /lha d+hAs kyi phye ma dang /sku rdzas kyi chos gos dang //
367a2('bum): lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /b+hU sa kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dran dang /wA rdzas kyi sgrol sgron myang bas rim gror byas/'u
367a3('bum): sbyor byas/bu dud du byas/mchod par byas ni/kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam
367a4('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol po/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs
367a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bram du byas shing /'dzin pa dang /'chung ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
367a6('bum): dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bris shong me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bye ma dang /na brgya dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
367a7('bum): mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/bu drung du byed/mchod par byed na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
367b1('bum): kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/kau shi ka sprul te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
367b2('bum): gang la la zhig gis/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'dri rin po che
367b3('bum): sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang
367b4('bum): rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /g+ha rdza sau k+Sh+mI phye ma dang /sa kyi chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi ni bza' dang /rdzas
367b5('bum): kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas//
367b6('bum): mchod par byas na/kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lAm/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
367b7('bum): bcom ldan 'ongs mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/gang
368a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed
368a2('bum): cing /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dran dang /sil snyan sna
368a3('bum): tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po
368a4('bum): stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/kau shri ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis//
368a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
368a6('bum): mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba
368a7('bum): dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lho rjes kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /
368b1('bum): lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzus kyi ba dran dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/kau shi
368b2('bum): ka de la ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar
368b3('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi kra de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par
368b4('bum): byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed/tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /
368b5('bum): noni bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /baM dan dang /sil snyan+da sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed na/
368b6('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi kA stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog
368b7('bum): gi/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can re res/de bzhin gshegs pa
369a1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun lngas byas pa'i mchod rten 'phyang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyur dpag tshad phyeng/
369a2('bum): prabu sha stag byas te/de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas
369a3('bum): kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas
369a4('bum): kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab
369a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang /rnam pa
369a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral brla byas te/de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /
369a7('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/de nyid
369b1('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/bcom ldan 'das
369b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gror bgyis pa dang /bkur stir bgyis pa dang /phu dud du bgyis pa dang /mchod par bgyis pas ni/'das pa dang /ma byon
369b3('bum): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gror bgyis pa dang /bkur stir bgyis pa dang //
369b4('bum): phu dud du bgyis pa dang /mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro//shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
369b5('bum): de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mo ngan las 'das nas/mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang
369b6('bum): du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba
369b7('bum): dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi
370a1('bum): ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi silA spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyiste/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /
370a2('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+ge'i klung gi bye ma sbrid na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems cani re res kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
370a3('bum): su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis
370a4('bum): te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye
370a5('bum): ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dran dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/
370a6('bum): bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji skad cig mchis pa
370a7('bum): de dag las sems can re res kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'ongs nas/mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten
370b1('bum): 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang
370b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas
370b3('bum): kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
370b4('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
370b5('bum): nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal
370b6('bum): pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzis kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas
370b7('bum): kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis//
371a1('bum): bkur stir bgyis/phru dung du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bAd+tha'i klung gi bya
371a2('bum): mya skyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin
371a3('bum): po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phung du dpag chad tsam la/rgyur dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i
371a4('bum): lhag mir lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye mu dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha
371a5('bum): rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dung du
371a6('bum): bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /shwar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa
371a7('bum): de dag las/sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshogs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i
371b1('bum): mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsa mu la/rgyar dpag tshad byed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha
371b2('bum): rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal
371b3('bum): mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /lho
371b4('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
371b5('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsamra la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag
371b6('bum): bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha
371b7('bum): rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs
372a1('bum): kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
372a2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod
372a3('bum): pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa
372a4('bum): 'am/bskul ba'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rjes kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /
372a5('bum): rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sa rim gror bgyis/
372a6('bum): bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni/sems can ji snyed cig/
372a7('bum): mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i
372b1('bum): mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyar dpag chud phyed pa sha stag bgyismra tI/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog drung /lha
372b2('bum): rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal
372b3('bum): mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dran dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gyur bgyis/bkur spyir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa dang /
372b4('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
372b5('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/rin po che sna bdun lus bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/rgyur dpag tshad phyed pa sha
372b6('bum): stag bgyis te/de dag la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lha rjes kyi byug
372b7('bum): pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba ngan dang /lha rdzas kyi sol
373a1('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis na/bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar
373a2('bum): dgongs/de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lpags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka
373a3('bum): mang ngo //brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing //
373a4('bum): 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid cing /de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'
373a5('bum): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du dgyis/mchod par bgyid
373a6('bum): na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus
373a7('bum): te/'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las gyi lam rnams dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sbyin
373b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
373b2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
373b3('bum): chen pa stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog
373b4('bum): mA dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang //
373b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag
373b6('bum): pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang //
373b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa sdug bsngal
374a1('bum): ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
374a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
374a3('bum): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams
374a4('bum): cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so//de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
374a5('bum): bstan pa ste/de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
374a6('bum): cad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//phyin to//phyin par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bco brgyad
374a7('bum): pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
374b1('bum): bla mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//glang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing /glegs bam du byas te/'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog
374b2('bum): cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /gong du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /
374b3('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/de'i phyir
374b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad med grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med dpag tu med par 'phel lo//de ci'i
374b5('bum): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
374b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
374b7('bum): las byung ba ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol
375a1('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
375a2('bum): pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha
375a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/phyi nang stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
375a4('bum): las byung ba ni/chen po stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba
375a5('bum): ni/'dus byas stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni//
375a6('bum): mtha' lus 'ongs pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
375a7('bum): byung ba ni//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni//
375b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/mi
375b2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ngo
375b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/dran pa nye
375b4('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rdzu
375b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/dbang po rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/stobs
375b6('bum): rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA las+ya byung bA ni/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/'phags pa'i
375b7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni//
376a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/chad med pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
376a2('bum): byung ba ni/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rnam par thar pa rnams so//shes
376a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rnam par
376a4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/mngon par shes pa rnams
376a5('bum): so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ting nge 'dzin rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//
376a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lngas byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/mi 'jigs pa rnams
376a7('bum): so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/byams pa chen
376b1('bum): po'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/snying rje chen po'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
376b2('bum): rnams so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/sems can
376b3('bum): yongs su smin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/thams cad shes pa nyid do//shes
376b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//ko/
376b5('bum): shi kra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/nyan thos kyi theg pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//shes
376b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/theg pa chen po'o//kau shi kra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
376b7('bum): bo/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang /bcang ba
377a1('bum): dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /thug pa dang /phye
377a2('bum): ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rIm gror byas bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod
377a3('bum): par byas na/bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba sdu mas brgya'i char yong nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag
377a4('bum): stong go cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba brgya'o cha dang /bye ba stong gi chu dang /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /grangasra dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dper yang
377a5('bum): nye bar mi 'gro/rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du/dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du//
377a6('bum): sangs rgyas dkon mchig nub par mi 'gyur ro//chos dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro//dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par mi 'gyur ro//de srid du dge ba bcu'i
377a7('bum): las kyilam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
377b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig
377b2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//brtsom
377b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
377b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nung stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyo stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig
377b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid
377b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtha'
377b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung por 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig
378a1('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
378a2('bum): 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa
378a3('bum): nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
378a4('bum): ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
378a5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
378a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
378a7('bum): 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
378b1('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung //
378b2('bum): bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig
378b3('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs
378b4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du
378b5('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
378b6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
378b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze'i rigs
379a1('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i
379a2('bum): ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rgyu gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtsho ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
379a3('bum): ro//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
379a4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs ras kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs
379a5('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
379a6('bum): 'gyur ro//chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
379a7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med dge
379b1('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rlung che'i
379b2('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi
379b3('bum): tsheche ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
379b4('bum): ro//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byu
379b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro//lan+da cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
379b6('bum): sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yod do//bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye
379b7('bum): shes yod do//chos kyi 'khor lo skur ba yod do//sems can yongs su smin pa yod do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do//de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji
380a1('bum): rten gyi khams 'di na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum curtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /
380a2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha
380a3('bum): rnams dang /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang /snang ba'i lha rnams dang /chung snang gi lha rnams dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
380a4('bum): dang /dge ba'i lha rnams dang /chung dge'i lha rnams dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /che ba'i lha rnams dang /chung che'i lha rnams
380a5('bum): dang /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /
380a6('bum): nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang /'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar
380a7('bum): bya'o//grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o//grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o//grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol
380b1('bum): tu phyin pa kun chub par bya'o//grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /
380b2('bum): btsongs pa dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par
380b3('bum): mi 'gyur ro//dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/grogs po drag chos kyi tshul rgyun ma chad de/grogs po
380b4('bum): ngag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzod/
380b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung
380b6('bum): bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
380b7('bum): 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
381a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
381a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa
381a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang
381a4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
381a5('bum): 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
381a6('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
381a7('bum): dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur
381b1('bum): ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten
381b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar
381b3('bum): pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
381b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten
381b5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi
381b6('bum): 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung
381b7('bum): bar 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
382a1('bum): ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du
382a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang byang chub 'jig rten du
382a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka'
382a4('bum): stsal pa/kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhig/tshangs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/ko shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi
382a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang
382a6('bum): 'thab mo bya'o//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tshams sbrul lo snyam na/de'i tshe kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis sems la kha ton gyis
382a7('bum): shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang /des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/sems bskyed pa de dag smos shing /rnam par 'phel bar mi
382b1('bum): 'gyur ro//lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na'ang /kau shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
382b2('bum): pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang /de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/lha'i gnas de nyid
382b3('bum): du skye bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am gang su'ang rung ste/
382b4('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
382b5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
382b6('bum): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
382b7('bum): mya ngan las 'das so//ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag
383a1('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab cing /bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
383a2('bum): 'gyur ro//da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
383a3('bum): pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho stong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
383a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas s+ho//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas
383a5('bum): kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
383a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od ni rig sngags chen mo'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i
383a7('bum): rig sngags so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
383b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bya'o//dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/kau shrI
383b2('bum): kA de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nI rig sngags chen mo'o//kau shrI kya 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'idi
383b3('bum): ni nA med pa'i rig sngags so//kau shi ka 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa drang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kaushi ka
383b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/bla na
383b5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
383b6('bum): rgyas de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//da ltar phyogs bcu'i
383b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la
384a1('bum): brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig
384a2('bum): sngags 'di yod na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod
384a3('bum): pa yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
384a4('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha
384a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/nang
384a6('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod/
384a7('bum): pa yin/chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/'dus
384b1('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin//
384b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rang gi mtshan nyid
384b3('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig
384b4('bum): rten na yod pa yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig
384b5('bum): rten na yod pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/byang chub kyi yan lag
384b6('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rnam par thar pa
384b7('bum): rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
385a1('bum): dang /smon pa med pa 'jig rten nu yod pa yin/mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa
385a2('bum): yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod
385a3('bum): pa yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/
385a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/de bzhin
385a5('bum): nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/chos nyid 'jig rten na
385a6('bum): yod pa yin/chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/chos skyon med pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/mig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rgyun du zhugs
385a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/dgra bcom
385b1('bum): bab nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na
385b2('bum): yod pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya nyer gsum pa/
385b3('bum): kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
385b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig
385b5('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
385b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten no gdags su yod pa yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
385b7('bum): pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
386a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
386a2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/'dus byas
386a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
386a4('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
386a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig
386a6('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
386a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
386b1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/yang dgra par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin//
386b2('bum): dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa
386b3('bum): yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rnam par
386b4('bum): thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong
386b5('bum): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ting nge
386b6('bum): 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdugs su yod pa yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na
386b7('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/snying
387a1('bum): rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/thams cad
387a2('bum): shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig
387a3('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rgyun du zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/phyir mi
387a4('bum): 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/de
387a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
387a6('bum): yod na/rtsi dang rgyu skar dang /skur ma thams cad gdags su yod do//kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/dge ba'i spyod
387a7('bum): pa dang /yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par
387b1('bum): shes pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
387b2('bum): dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgro dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /
387b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsi thams cad gdags su yod do//slob pa dang /mi slob pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
387b4('bum): kyi rgyu skar dang /skar ma thams cad kyang gdogs su yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur
387b5('bum): //gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten
387b6('bum): pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
387b7('bum): theg pa chen po rnams te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims
388a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam
388a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong
388a3('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la
388a4('bum): spyod pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lo spyod pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa
388a5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang bzhin stong po nyid la spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa
388a6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dran pa nye bar
388a7('bum): bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /stobs
388b1('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
388b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po rnams la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa
388b3('bum): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /
388b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lo spyod pa dang /
388b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang /byams pa chen po la spyod pa dang /snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
388b6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang /nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du mi byed pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sangs
388b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
389a1('bum): phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
389a2('bum): rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung bar rig par bya'o//kau shri ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
389a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag
389a4('bum): dang /tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
389a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan
389a6('bum): par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang
389a7('bum): ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par mi
389b1('bum): 'gyur ro//mtshan gyis dus byed par mo 'gyur ro//myos dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//chus dus byed par mi 'gyur ba nas/nang brgya rtsa gtsug go bar gyis dus byed
389b2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//rgyal po dang blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed cing
389b3('bum): rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/de la glags 'tshol ba de dag gis glags mi rnyed de/rgyal po'i bu dang /rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang /gtam bya bar
389b4('bum): sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang /mthus de ltar sems so//
389b5('bum): gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing /rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/de la rgyal po'i bu 'am/rgyal po'i blon po chen
389b6('bum): po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang /gtam bya bar sems shing /dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs
389b7('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag/snying rje'i sems dang /dga' ba'i sems dang /btang snyoms kyi
390a1('bum): sems nye bar bzhag pa'i phyir te/kaushika/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /tho/
390a2('bum): pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan gang dag
390a3('bum): dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste/nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur te/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang
390a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
390a5('bum): pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan
390a6('bum): rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
390a7('bum): pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs
390b1('bum): kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
390b2('bum): 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar mi skye//
390b3('bum): byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o//de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du mi 'gyur/nam yang dbul po'i rigs su mi skye/smyig
390b4('bum): mi mkhan gyi rigs sam/sme sha can gyi rigs sam/mgar ba 'am/phyag dar ba 'am/shen pa 'am/phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/dmangs rigs su mi skye
390b5('bum): ste/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe
390b6('bum): skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu brdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de 'dod na sangs rgyas
390b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur ba dang /chos nyan pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/
391a1('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag
391a2('bum): par byed do//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar
391a3('bum): bya/bcang bar bya/klag par bya/kun chub par bya/tshul bzhin du yid la bya/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya ste/de dag ni nam
391a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan de dag dang ldan
391a5('bum): par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u bcu dgu pa'o////de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu
391a6('bum): rgyu ba/glags blta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur
391a7('bum): te/mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba brgya po glags blta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na/de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab
391b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong nas/bar chad byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan
391b2('bum): 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di snyed cig gzung ba de dag kha tan du bya'o snyam nas/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha
391b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ji snyed cig gzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do//de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs
391b4('bum): su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang /sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba de
391b5('bum): ngag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/lam de nyid dang /sgo de nyid nas phyir dang na de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang /
391b6('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
391b7('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/
392a1('bum): nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/lam de nyid dang /sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun
392a2('bum): tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la'ang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/mu stegs can gzhan dang /kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i
392a3('bum): sems dang ldan pa glags blta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang /shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
392a4('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs par bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/zhe sdang
392a5('bum): ba'i sems sam/glags blta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong/
392a6('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtsho ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /
392a7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad
392b1('bum): med snang ba dang /kun snang drang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu
392b2('bum): che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas
392b3('bum): gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri yongs su bzung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
392b4('bum): ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
392b5('bum): dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b6('bum): chen po dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /num mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phyo chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de

394b1('bum): stag go/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji

395a5('bum): du sems par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur/'dod pa la
395a6('bum): spyod pa dang /gzugs la spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/bla na med
395a7('bum): po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/bar chad bya'o snyam nas
395b1('bum): bdud sdig to can gyis/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po

395b3('bum): 'dod la bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshegs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bi mi bi sa ri'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam mi

395b5('bum): can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang glags lta zhing /glegs 'tshol ba/sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la'ang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyi//
395b6('bum): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o//dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
395b7('bum): phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de
396a1('bum): lta de ltar bdud sdig can de dag lam de nyid dang /sgo de nyid nas phyir log go/de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /'og min
396a2('bum): gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khrod bzhin du bcom ldan
396a3('bum): 'das gang na ba der gtor te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas/tshig 'di skad du brjod do//dzam+bu'i gling gi mi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha
396a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod par gyur cig/dzam+bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa

396a6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o//dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
396a7('bum): khams dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/
396b1('bum): dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod
396b2('bum): pa khyad par du 'phags pa'ang yod par 'gyur zhe'o//phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du
396b3('bum): byas te/'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o//phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
396b4('bum): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//
396b5('bum): de de bzhin te/ji srid du dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
396b6('bum): rgyas kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong gsum gyi stong chen
396b7('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang nub
397a1('bum): par mi 'gyur la/dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems

397a4('bum): shes so//de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog mang po mngon par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor te/'di skad kyi tshig brjod
397a5('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid
397a6('bum): cing /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam/bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha glags 'chol ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do//bcom ldan 'das
397a7('bum): bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bskyang ba bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/

397b2('bum): pa'am/ston pa dang mtshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs

397b6('bum): phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro//
