398a1('bum): la bgyid pa de dag ni/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
398a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'dra lta ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
398a3('bum): pa btsal bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
398a4('bum): lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad

398a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam pa thams
398a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/rnam pa thams
398b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
398b2('bum): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u nyi shu pa'o//
398b3('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/
398b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

398b6('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma
398b7('bum): mdzad/de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang
399a1('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma
399a2('bum): mdzad/de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar mtha' lus
399a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
399a4('bum): kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su
399a5('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mang yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad
399a6('bum): de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar dngos po med
399a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de
399b1('bum): ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
399b2('bum): pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar dbang po rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar stobs rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad//
399b3('bum): de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//ji ltar
399b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi
399b5('bum): ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar tshad med pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ming yang
399b6('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad//
399b7('bum): de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
400a1('bum): med pa'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa na mdzad/de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams
400a2('bum): kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming yongs su brjod
400a3('bum): pa mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar
400a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar snying rje chen po'i ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
400a5('bum): pa bco brgyad kyi ming yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang
400a6('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med
400a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
400b1('bum): /meng pa dang /smyon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'dzegs pa
400b2('bum): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o//kun tu 'dren pa'o//dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa
400b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
400b4('bum): pa/de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
400b5('bum): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mo bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam//
400b6('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson
400b7('bum): 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams
401a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
401a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ji snyam du sems/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/gsol
401a3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/rnam pa thams
401a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa
401a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/rnam pa thams cad
401a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes
401a7('bum): rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
401b1('bum): su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin
401b2('bum): pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
401b3('bum): phyin pa yin no//mi skye bo'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
401b4('bum): pa yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//mi skye ba'i tshul dang /
401b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa
401b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams
401b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ni/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
402a1('bum): bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
402a2('bum): pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan ni/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
402a3('bum): pa'i shes rab ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes
402a4('bum): rab ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul
402a5('bum): gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang
402a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ji ltar gnyis su ma mchos pa'i tshul
402a7('bum): dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ji ltar
402b1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus
402b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ji ltar gnyi sum mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
402b3('bum): bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi skye ba'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa
402b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang
402b5('bum): tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /'du shes gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mig gnyis
402b6('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /rna ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /sna gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lce gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lus gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /yid gnyis
402b7('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /sgra gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dri gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /ro gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /reg
403a1('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /chos gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
403a2('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis
403a3('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i
403a4('bum): tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /yid
403a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i
403a6('bum): tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
403a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /si'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /chu'i khams
403b1('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mo'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rlung gi khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /nam mkha'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rnam
403b2('bum): par shes pa'i khams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /ma rig pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /'du byed gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /
403b3('bum): ming dang gzugs gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /skye mched drug gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /tshor ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /sred pa gnyis
403b4('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /len pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /srid pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /skye ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rga shi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /sbyin
403b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /brtson
403b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul
403b7('bum): dang /nang stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis
404a1('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su
404a2('bum): med pa'i tshul dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
404a3('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis
404a4('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis
404a5('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gnyis su
404a6('bum): med pa'i tshul dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dbang po rnams gnyis su med pa'i
404a7('bum): tshul dang /stobs rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis
404b1('bum): su med pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /tshad med pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i///
404b2('bum): tshul dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
404b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mngon par
404b4('bum): shes pa rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
404b5('bum): bcu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /snying rje chen po gnyis su med pa'i tshul
404b6('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su
404b7('bum): med pa'i tshul dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /dgra ba com pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /rang byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /bla na med pa
405a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar tshor ba
405a2('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis
405a3('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
405a4('bum): lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis
405a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
405a6('bum): reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rna ba'i
405a7('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis
405b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mig gi 'dus te
405b2('bum): reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
405b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis
405b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
405b5('bum): tshul dang /ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
405b6('bum): dang /ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sna tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
405b7('bum): dang /ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar chu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar me'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
406a1('bum): tshul dang /ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rnam
406a2('bum): par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji
406a3('bum): lhur rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar ming dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang //
406a4('bum): ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar len pa
406a5('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rga shi gnyis su ma mchis
406a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar bzod/
406a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
406b1('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar phyi
406b2('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar chen
406b3('bum): po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
406b4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gnyis
406b5('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar chos thams
406b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
406b7('bum): tshul dang /ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
407a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams
407a2('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dbang po rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar stobs
407a3('bum): rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su ma mchis
407a4('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar tshad med pa rnams
407a5('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis
407a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
407a7('bum): smon pa med pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
407b1('bum): dang /ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar mi 'jigs pa
407b2('bum): bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
407b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
407b4('bum): 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar
407b5('bum): rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gnyis su
407b6('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis lags///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
407b7('bum): phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya nyer bzhi pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs
408a1('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
408a2('bum): dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su
408a3('bum): byar med do//'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes
408a4('bum): pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mig ni mig gis
408a5('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
408a6('bum): ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sna ni snas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis
408a7('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do//lce ni lces stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lus ni
408b1('bum): lus kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do//yid ni yid kyis sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
408b2('bum): de ni 'di ltar yid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs drang ba
408b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sgra ni sgras sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su me du gnyis su
408b4('bum): bya med do//dri ni dris stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'dra ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ron ros stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
408b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar ro dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//reg ni reg gis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar reg dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
408b6('bum): dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//chos ni chos kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
408b7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su ma de gnyis
409a1('bum): su byar med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu
409a2('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa
409a3('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med do gnyis su byar med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam
409a4('bum): par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
409a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong
409a6('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi
409a7('bum): 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i 'dus te
409b1('bum): reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byur med do//sna'i ju
409b2('bum): te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lce'i 'dus te
409b3('bum): reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi
409b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
409b5('bum): do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su
409b6('bum): byar med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
409b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
410a1('bum): bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
410a2('bum): med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
410a3('bum): gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas
410a4('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lus kyi 'dus te
410a5('bum): rernyog pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu
410a6('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir
410a7('bum): zhe na/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong
410b1('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe
410b2('bum): nin/de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'dri
410b3('bum): ltar me'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rlung gi
410b4('bum): khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar nam
410b5('bum): mkha'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir
410b6('bum): zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na//
410b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang
411a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas skyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'dri lta
411a2('bum): rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
411a3('bum): ltar ming dang gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar skye
411a4('bum): mched drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa
411a5('bum): 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su
411a6('bum): byar med do//sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//len pa ni len pas
411a7('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni
411b1('bum): 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar smyo ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
411b2('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
411b3('bum): med do//nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
411b4('bum): do//phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//phyi
411b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//stong
411b6('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
411b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
412a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/dro ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
412a2('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin
412a3('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'od ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
412a4('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni
412a5('bum): 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
412a6('bum): nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dor ba med
412a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
412b1('bum): med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
412b2('bum): med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de
412b3('bum): gnyis su byar med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
412b4('bum): dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol
412b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa stong
412b6('bum): pa nyid dang /pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa
412b7('bum): nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
413a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran//
413a2('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//yang
413a3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
413a4('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang pha rol tu
413a5('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa
413a6('bum): 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
413a7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
413b1('bum): dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lam ni lam gyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lAm dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su/
413b2('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'o bden pa rnams dang pha rol
413b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams dang pha rol tu
413b4('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams dang pha rol tu
413b5('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/de
413b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa rnams ni
413b7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mthar gyis
414a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/da ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis
414a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
414a3('bum): pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
414a4('bum): dang smon pa med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
414a5('bum): de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir
414a6('bum): zhe na/de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sku stong ste/de ci'i
414a7('bum): phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs
414b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//mi 'jigs pa
414b2('bum): rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//so so yang dag
414b3('bum): par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis
414b4('bum): su byar med do//byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
414b5('bum): snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos sbyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
414b6('bum): 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
414b7('bum): memod de gnyis su byar med do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu
415a1('bum): phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus spyong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
415a2('bum): ni 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/
415a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong
415a4('bum): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyis stong ste/de ci'i
415a5('bum): phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rang byang chub dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis
415a6('bum): stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//bla na med pa yang dag par
415a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang
415b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dga' bo de lta bas na/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//
415b2('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
415b3('bum): nyid do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//
415b4('bum): tshad med pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//
415b5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
415b6('bum): nyid do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
415b7('bum): thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi thog mar
416a1('bum): 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//
416a2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//snying
416a3('bum): rje chen po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//
416a4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//rnam
416a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do//dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/sa chen po la sa bon btab pa/rgyu rkyen tshogs par
416a6('bum): gyur nas/rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'ang /sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas te/sa chen po la brten cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
416a7('bum): tu phyin pa la brtan cing pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag rnam par 'phel lo//nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam
416b1('bum): par 'phel lo//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par
416b2('bum): 'phel lo//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//dor ba
416b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par
416b4('bum): 'phel lo//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//dngos po med pa'i
416b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//yang dag par spong ba rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rnam
416b6('bum): par 'phel lo//dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel lo//stobs rnams rnam par 'phel lo//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam par 'phel lo//'phags pa'i lam yan lag
416b7('bum): brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo//'phags phyi'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo//tshad med pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//gzugs
417a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
417a2('bum): rnam par 'phel lo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnam par 'phel lo//mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//
417a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo//gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo//mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par
417a4('bum): 'phel lo//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo//
417a5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/dga' bo rnam pa thams
417a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par 'phel
417a7('bum): lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /yang dag
417b1('bum): par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten
417b2('bum): cing /dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /stobs lnga rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /byang chub
417b3('bum): kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
417b4('bum): nyid la brten cing /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /bsam gtan bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad
417b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /tshad med pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel
417b6('bum): lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
417b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnam par 'phel
418a1('bum): lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing //
418a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
418a3('bum): brten cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa
418a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel
418a5('bum): lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /thams
418a6('bum): cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten cing /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
418a7('bum): la brten cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo//dga' bo de lta bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs
418b1('bum): su sgrub pa'o//stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
418b2('bum): bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//dbang po lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o//stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
418b3('bum): yongs su sgrub pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//bsam gtan bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//tshad med pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms
418b4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo
418b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su sgrub pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o//gzungs
418b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs
418b7('bum): su sgrub pa'o//snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o//thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o//lam
419a1('bum): mi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o//de nam+b+ha m+b+ha'i dbang po ban+d+ha byin gyis bcom ldan/
419a2('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
419a3('bum): yon tan gang bdag gis/bcom ldan 'das las thos te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa
419a4('bum): dang /yongs su chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji
419a5('bum): snyed cig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par bgyis pa dang /spel ba de dag thams cad bka' stsal to//
419a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /spel ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/dge ba
419a7('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro///
419b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten
419b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha
419b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar
419b4('bum): 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stong pa
419b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus
419b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
419b7('bum): thothig ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
420a1('bum): bar 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi dmigs
420a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
420a3('bum): 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba
420a4('bum): bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung
420a5('bum): bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden
420a6('bum): pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar
420a7('bum): 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar
420b1('bum): 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig
420b2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po
420b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba
420b4('bum): dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par bgyis pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
420b5('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
420b6('bum): rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis
420b7('bum): so//'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshangs lha
421a1('bum): nye phran gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//
421a2('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams
421a3('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so//dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//dge
421a4('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
421a5('bum): na mchis so//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//shin tu
421a6('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab
421a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par bgyis pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na
421b1('bum): mchis so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//rang sangs rgyas rnams///
421b2('bum): 'jig rten na mchis so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang
421b3('bum): bklags pa dang /kun chub par bgyis pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten du 'byung
421b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ko shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags
421b5('bum): pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni der zad par yang ma bshad de/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
421b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma
421b7('bum): bral bar byed pa de dag ni/tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /
422a1('bum): klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin
422a2('bum): gyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa
422a3('bum): dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni shes rab kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
422a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam
422a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/rnam par grol ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
422a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
422a7('bum): dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
422b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral
422b2('bum): bar byed pa de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs par rig par bya'o//kau shi ka nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin
422b3('bum): gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul
422b4('bum): khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las/kau shi ka tshul
422b5('bum): khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'di la ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs
422b6('bum): rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i
422b7('bum): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
423a1('bum): bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs
423a2('bum): su'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar
423a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las/sems rnam par grol yang chos gang yang yongs su shes pa med do//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
423a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de la me tog dang /
423a5('bum): phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim gror byed pa dang /bkur stir byed
423a6('bum): pa dang /phu dud du byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa de dag tshe 'di nyid dang /tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du 'thob par ngas bshad do//brgya byin gyis gsol
423a7('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin
423b1('bum): du yid la bgyid cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa
423b2('bum): dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid pa dang /bkur stir bgyid pa dang /phu drung du bgyid pa dang /
423b3('bum): mchod par bgyid pa de la ni bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bskyang bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am
423b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa'i tshe/lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ongs te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
423b5('bum): mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe'ang /lha'i bu de dag spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so//chos smra ba de dag smra snyam par gyur na'ang /lha'i bu de
423b6('bum): ngadag chos kyi rim gror de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/kau shri ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog
423b7('bum): pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bris shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /bdug spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs
424a1('bum): dang /rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /bkur stir byed pa dang /phu dud du byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa de dag
424a2('bum): gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di'ang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i tshe/
424a3('bum): la la zhig bdag la klan ka 'chol zhing glags lta bar gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bya bar zhum pa med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la
424a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bskyang ba byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ni 'jig rten pa dang /'jig
424a5('bum): rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /thun mong dang thung mong ma yin pa dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /
424a6('bum): nyan thos kyi chos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha mi dad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di na
424a7('bum): dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gter yin la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang /nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
424b1('bum): la gnas pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang
424b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas
424b3('bum): pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas
424b4('bum): pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
424b5('bum): pa la glags blta ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang glags blta bar byed pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
424b6('bum): phyin pa la gang glags blta bar bya ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
424b7('bum): lo sus kyang glags blta ba med do//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa
425a1('bum): dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par mi 'gyur/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur/'jigs par mi 'gyur/dngang bar mi 'gyur/skrag par
425a2('bum): mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/'jigs par 'gyur
425a3('bum): ba'am/dngang bar 'gyur ba'am/skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
425a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bris shing de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos
425a5('bum): dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /bkur stir byed pa dang /phu dud
425a6('bum): du byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
425a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /bris shing de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang
425b1('bum): spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /bkur spyir byed pa dang /phu dud du
425b2('bum): byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa de ni/pha dang ma dang /gnyen pashes dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze dag gis dgos par bya ba yin/phyogs bcu'i 'jig
425b3('bum): rten gyi khams na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /dgra bcom pa dang /phyir
425b4('bum): mi 'ong ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs
425b5('bum): pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pas kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/spobs pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin//
425b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin//
425b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'phrogs par
426a1('bum): 'gyur ba yin/nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs
426a2('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi
426a3('bum): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong
426a4('bum): pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
426a5('bum): ba yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
426a6('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin//
426a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa
426b1('bum): mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/yang dag par spong ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/dbang po lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs
426b2('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/stobs lnga sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
426b3('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/bsam gtan bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/tshad med pa
426b4('bum): bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur
426b5('bum): ba yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
426b6('bum): pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/mngon par shes pa sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/ting nge 'dzin sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/gzungs kyi sgo
426b7('bum): sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin
427a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/snying rje chen po sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
427a2('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su das
427a3('bum): par bya ba sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba yin/gzhan gyis phyir brgol ba ji snyed byung ba la'ang chos
427a4('bum): dang mthun par lan gdab pa'i mthu yod pa yin te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun
427a5('bum): chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa dang /bris shing de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang //
427a6('bum): spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /bkur stir byed pa dang /
427a7('bum): phudud du byed pa dang /mchod pa byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya po/
427b1('bum): bam po brgya nyer lnga pa//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/'chang ba der stong gsum gyi stong
427b2('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /
427b3('bum): dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshongs lha nye phan dang /chings pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /
427b4('bum): chung snang dang /tshad med sdang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras
427b5('bum): bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /gzung ba dang /kun chub par
427b6('bum): bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dod par sems so//gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min
427b7('bum): gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /gzung ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so///
428a1('bum): kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /sum cu
428a2('bum): rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs
428a3('bum): chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /
