428a4('bum): tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /
428a5('bum): shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom sdang ba dang /'og min gyi lha dang /de ma yin pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
428a6('bum): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya ba mang po dag kyang der dong zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /gzung ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /
428a7('bum): gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so//kau shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
428b1('bum): kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang /tshangs lha
428b2('bum): phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas
428b3('bum): dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris mi che ba dang /mi
428b4('bum): gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha dang /de ma yin pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /namamra mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
428b5('bum): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /gzung ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la
428b6('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa 'di byin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par byas te/de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klog pa dang /gzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /
428b7('bum): mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/gdud pa byas nos phyir 'dong ngo //kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen
429a1('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtsho ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs//
429a2('bum): lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dag dang /tshad med dge ba dang /
429a3('bum): dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu
429a4('bum): dag dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtshe ma'i lha dang /dga' ldan gyi lha dang /'phrul dga'i lha
429a5('bum): dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /tshangs ris kyi lha dang /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /tshangs chen gyi lha dang /snang ba'i lha dang /chung
429a6('bum): snang gi lha dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /dge ba'i lha dang /chung dge'i lha dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha dang /dge rgyas kyi lha dang /che ba'i lha dang /
429a7('bum): chung che'i lha dang /tshad med che ba'i lha dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /mi che ba'i lha dang /mi gdung ba'i lha dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /'og min
429b1('bum): gyi lha de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bskyang ba byed de/kau shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/kau shi ka
429b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
429b3('bum): pa de dag kyang der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /bskyang bar bya ba'i don du 'dong bar
429b4('bum): sems te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/sems
429b5('bum): can thams cad bskyab pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro//brgya byin
429b6('bum): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klagro pA dang /gzung ba
429b7('bum): dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /gdud pa bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
430a1('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir mtsho ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir dga' ldan//
430a2('bum): kyigyilha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir 'phrul dka' lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir tshangs
430a3('bum): ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir tshangs
430a4('bum): chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir chung snang gi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams
430a5('bum): 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir chung dge'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes
430a6('bum): bgyi ba dang /'dir tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /
430a7('bum): 'dir chung che'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bkye ba dang /'dir tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'angs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir mi
430b1('bum): 'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes byagyi ba dang /'dir mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dris so zhes bkyi ba dang /'dir shin tu mthong ba'i sku rnams 'ongs su zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir gyi nom snang
430b2('bum): ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /'dir 'og mi ni gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka gal te
430b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha mthu bo che mthu chen
430b4('bum): po rdzu 'phrul che ba/dbang che ba/gzi brjid che ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /bcang ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /gdud par bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba
430b5('bum): dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags so zhes bya ba nges par khong du chud par bya'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
430b6('bum): gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang nye bar 'ongs shung /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /gzung ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /rim
430b7('bum): gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod pa byas nas/shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur ro//gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji skad cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha
431a1('bum): mthu bo che mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gung du 'dong par sems so//ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu/
431a2('bum): 'phrul che ba/dbang che ba/gzi brjid che ba/de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de'i
431a3('bum): gnas kyi 'khor kun tu'ang gtsang sbra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/de'i 'khor gyi
431a4('bum): sa'ang spos chu'i chag chag gis gdab bo//me tog dang /spos kyis gtor to//bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod bzhag go/dar gyi lnga ldi dang /gos kyi bla re bre'o//sa'i phyogs
431a5('bum): rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang /lus
431a6('bum): yang ba dang /lus gsal ba'ang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sems bde ba dang /sems yang ba dang /sems gsal ba'ang nyams su
431a7('bum): myong bar 'gyur ro//de nas nub mo nyal na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//des mthong na'ang
431b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun tu brgyan pa/sku gsar
431b2('bum): gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bdar ba/chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs/
431b3('bum): pa de las 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
431b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong po nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /
431b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med
431b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
431b7('bum): dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
432a1('bum): dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
432a2('bum): rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
432a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin
432a4('bum): rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
432a5('bum): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par
432a6('bum): 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//brtson
432a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha
432b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur/
432b2('bum): ro/phyi nang stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid de'i don rnam
432b3('bum): par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//'dus
432b4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
432b5('bum): de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par
432b6('bum): 'gyur ro//chos thams cad stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//mi dmigs
432b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par
433a1('bum): phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bya zhag pa bzhi po de dag gi
433a2('bum): don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par bya/
433a3('bum): ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//dbang po lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//stobs lnga po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi
433a4('bum): yan lag bdun po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//'phags
433a5('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa bzhi po de dag
433a6('bum): gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa brgyad po de
433a7('bum): dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i
433b1('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//ting
433b2('bum): nge 'dzin de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag gi don rnam
433b3('bum): par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par
433b4('bum): 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//byang chub
433b5('bum): kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
433b6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
433b7('bum): brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par bgro bar byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par bya'o//sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o//
434a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o//bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham par bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/shar phyogs kyi
434a2('bum): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
434a3('bum): rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di skad cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/
434a4('bum): chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin
434a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig
434a6('bum): brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par
434a7('bum): 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'
434b1('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//byang
434b2('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
434b3('bum): sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas/
434b4('bum): te/chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che
434b5('bum): ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig
434b6('bum): dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro//shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
434b7('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo
435a1('bum): zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas

435a3('bum): mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig

438a4('bum): ba'i nyams med par 'gyur/zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/nad kyi rkyen sbyin dang /yo byad la chags pa med par 'gyur/zas kyi 'du shes

438a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yang la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zos la cher chags pa med pa yin/zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs

439b4('bum): gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang me 'bral bar bya'o//ko shi/
439b5('bum): ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs ma bklags/kun chub par ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas/gzhan dag
439b6('bum): la rgya cher mi ston na'ang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /bdug spos
439b7('bum): dang /drug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//phu dud du bya'o//mchod par
440a1('bum): bya'o//kau shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang /'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/kau shi ka rigs kyi/
440a2('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de bris te/me tog
440a3('bum): dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud
440a4('bum): du byed/mchod par byed na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
440a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /bshos dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen spun
440a6('bum): drang /yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu drung du byas/mchod par byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos
440a7('bum): kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /
440b1('bum): byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas pas
440b2('bum): na ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka'
440b3('bum): stsal pa/kau shi ka khyod kyis dzam+bu'i gling /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang
440b4('bum): la las byin na/de las gang blang bar bya/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te dzam+bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang la las
440b5('bum): stsal/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'odi glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
440b6('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma mchis pa'ang mA lags/mi rton pa'ang ma legs/btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag
440b7('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gror bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/phu dud du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal/
441a1('bum): ba'ang ma lags nA/bcom ldan 'das dedri bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/de'i slad du de bzhin gan/
441a2('bum): pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/bkur stir brtse ba lags/bu dung du bgyi ba lags/mchod par bgyi ba lags/sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
441a3('bum): phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
441a4('bum): lo lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /lha rdzas kyi spos dang /lhardzus kyi byug pa dang /lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /lha rjes kyi gdugs dang /lhad+hAs
441a5('bum): kyi rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing /bkur stir bgyid pa dang /phu dud du bgyid pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa'i
441a6('bum): tshe'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi
441a7('bum): ba lags/bkur stir bgyi ba lags/phu dud du bgyi ba lags/mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par
441b1('bum): bgyid do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/gzugs med pa//
441b2('bum): bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/gzugs med
441b3('bum): pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin
441b4('bum): pa dang /dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/bskyud pa'i phyir ma yin/dbri ba'i phyir ma
441b5('bum): yin/bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos
441b6('bum): rnams 'dor ba ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub
441b7('bum): pa ma yin/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
442a1('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin//
442a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yini/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/shes
442a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa
442a4('bum): nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid nyo bar sgrub pa ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/'dus ma byas
442a5('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
442a6('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mi
442a7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
442b1('bum): pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
442b2('bum): yin/dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye
442b3('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i
442b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rnam
442b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa
442b6('bum): ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/sngo so yang
442b7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yan/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
443a1('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa
443a2('bum): ma yin/rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no//brgya byin gyis
443a3('bum): smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub
443a4('bum): ba ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma
443a5('bum): yin/nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/'dus
443a6('bum): ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/tshul khrimos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
443a7('bum): nye bor sgrub po ma yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
443b1('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa
443b2('bum): ma yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma
443b3('bum): yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dor ba med pa
443b4('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mi/
443b5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar
443b6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dbang po rnams
443b7('bum): nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/
444a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/tshad med pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/gzugs med
444a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rnam par thar pa brgyad nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu nye bar sgrub pa ma
444a3('bum): yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yi ni/ting nge 'dzin
444a4('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/mi 'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub
444a5('bum): pa ma yin/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rgyun
444a6('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/dgra bcom pa nyid nye
444a7('bum): bar sgrub pa ma yin/rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya
444b1('bum): bar shes pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par
444b2('bum): bya ba ma yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
444b3('bum): mi gnyis pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
444b4('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/tshul khrims kyi pha
444b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
444b6('bum): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ko shi ka legs so legs so//de de bzhon te/ji skad smras pa de bzhin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
444b7('bum): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/
445a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir//
445a2('bum): zhe na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
445a3('bum): pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zho na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//
445a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
445a5('bum): lo gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la
445a6('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir
445a7('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pho
445b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /brtson 'grus rgya
445b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//
445b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
445b4('bum): phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
445b5('bum): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir
445b6('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
445b7('bum): gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis
446a1('bum): su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau sha
446a2('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis
446a3('bum): su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de
446a4('bum): gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
446a5('bum): 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de
446a6('bum): ni/de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis
446a7('bum): su byar med do//kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
446b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i
446b2('bum): mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' del gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
446b3('bum): kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka de ni 'di ltar bsam
446b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni//
446b5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka don 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de
446b6('bum): gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
446b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su
447a1('bum): 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /yang
447a2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod
447a3('bum): du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang
447a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi kra de ni 'di ltar shes
447a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su
447a6('bum): 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gyis
447a7('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
447b1('bum): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis
447b2('bum): su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka/
447b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
447b4('bum): gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
447b5('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
447b6('bum): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
447b7('bum): byar med do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya nyer drug pa//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
448a1('bum): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os
448a2('bum): pa ste/de la bslabs pas ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//
448a3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang
448a4('bum): po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/der lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig bdag gi rim grol mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod par bgyid de/nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan
448a5('bum): de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing /lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan de la
448a6('bum): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing /phyag btsal te slar mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang /kha ton du
448a7('bum): bgyid cing gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa der/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
448b1('bum): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo //nyan thos dang /rang
448b2('bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'dri las byung ngo //sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyi zhing
448b3('bum): 'dud pa bgyis nas/slar mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
448b4('bum): bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/shes
448b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to//rgyur gyur to//rkyen du gyur to//yongs su bsgrub par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas
448b6('bum): nu/cha de gnyis los bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/chos
448b7('bum): kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe/'jigs pa 'am/bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das
449a1('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
449a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste//
449a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma
449a4('bum): mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan
449a5('bum): ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims
449a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o///
449a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
449b1('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid ni smos su
449b2('bum): ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
449b3('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
449b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//
449b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom
449b6('bum): ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom
449b7('bum): ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom
450a1('bum): ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
450a2('bum): smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das
450a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma
450a4('bum): mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags
450a5('bum): ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis
450a6('bum): rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni mtshan
450a7('bum): ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan/
450b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni smos smra ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan
450b2('bum): 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis bya'o//
450b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni smos su
450b4('bum): ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos
450b5('bum): su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das dngos
450b6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste//
450b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod
451a1('bum): du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni mtshur ma//
451a2('bum): ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni
451a3('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni mtshan
451a4('bum): ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni
451a5('bum): mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
451a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
451a7('bum): ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das
451b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste//
451b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa
451b3('bum): ste/bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma
451b4('bum): mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams
451b5('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mthar
451b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
451b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis
452a1('bum): rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni smos su
452a2('bum): ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das mngon par
452a3('bum): shes pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan
452a4('bum): 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom
452a5('bum): ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du
452a6('bum): ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis//
452a7('bum): rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
452b1('bum): ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das snying
452b2('bum): chen po ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
452b3('bum): 'dres pa rnams ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan
452b4('bum): 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom
452b5('bum): ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchi sa/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis
452b6('bum): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad
452b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma mi mchis pa zhig lags te/mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma
453a1('bum): lags na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/chos thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dag
453a2('bum): rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
453a3('bum): par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston
453a4('bum): te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis
453a5('bum): pa de'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis par
453a6('bum): thugs su chung de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can+da rnams la mtshan ma mu mchis pa dang /rtags
453a7('bum): ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos sum mochis pa'i chos ston to//bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang mi dang lham
453b1('bum): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshon dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna
453b2('bum): tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bris shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /
453b3('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gang
453b4('bum): la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /de bris shing /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /
453b5('bum): spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/bkur stir bgyid/phu
453b6('bum): dud du bgyid/mchod par bgyid na/sbyor ba 'di dang ldan na de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems can
453b7('bum): dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis por bgyi'o//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang
454a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/sems can yongs su smin
454a2('bum): par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'brel bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /
454a3('bum): byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod
454a4('bum): pa bgyid cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
454a5('bum): khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/bcom ldan 'das
454a6('bum): dkon mchog de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
454a7('bum): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang /bkur stir bgyi ba dang /phu
454b1('bum): dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dgu la rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu drud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis
454b2('bum): na log par ltung ba dang /ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
454b3('bum): theg pa'am/yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
454b4('bum): ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
454b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te/gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
454b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bskyed pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa
454b7('bum): dang /gleng gzhi /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa
455a1('bum): bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/gzhan la bstan
455a2('bum): pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
455a3('bum): rnams so//'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo//'di las byung ba ni mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung du bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /
455a4('bum): ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
455a5('bum): chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /lho phyogs
455a6('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
455a7('bum): rgyas dang /byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
455b1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /lho nub kyi
455b2('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
455b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
455b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung du bstan pa
455b5('bum): dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'dras pa dang /skyes pa'i rlabs dang /shin tu rgyas po dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs
455b6('bum): pa brjod pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa gsungs te/bshad pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub
455b7('bum): par bgyis te/gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
456a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo//'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung du
456a2('bum): bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs
456a3('bum): pa brjod pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin
456a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
456a5('bum): mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa bgyid pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris
456a6('bum): shing /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bA danA dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /

456b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub
456b2('bum): par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni/sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dgos pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//byol song gi skye gnas
456b3('bum): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di
456b4('bum): lhur rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin
456b5('bum): to//'chang ngo //klog go/kun chub par bgyid do//tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do//bris pa de la'ang me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'

456b7('bum): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cid zhi bar bgyid pa'o//nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
457a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /de la me tog

458b1('bum): chen po de btags na/rlung de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/byang kun de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro//'dus pa'i bros btab

459b1('bum): dog gi gos kyis dkris te/chab kyi nang du stsal na/chub de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro//de dag dang gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te/

463a1('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/dbang po rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /dbang po rnams kyi snod do//
463a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/stobs rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /stobs rnams
463a3('bum): kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshong ma mchis so//de bzhin
463a4('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi
463a5('bum): ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni ched ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do//
463a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/'phags po'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs
463a7('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/bsam gtan rnams kyi
463b1('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par
463b2('bum): bgyi ste/tshad med pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /tshad med pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i
463b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
463b4('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/rnam par
463b5('bum): thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i
463b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
463b7('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
464a1('bum): pa'i yon tan ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni chang ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
464a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan+da ni
464a3('bum): ched ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig
464a4('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das
464a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /gzungs
464a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi yon tan
464a7('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i yon tan
464b1('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom
464b2('bum): ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
464b3('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni chad
464b4('bum): ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen po'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
464b5('bum): par bgyi ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod
464b6('bum): do//bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
464b7('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/lam gyi rnam pa
465a1('bum): shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das
465a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
465a3('bum): sku gdung de dag kyang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/de bzhin nyid kyi yon
465a4('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /de bzhin nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
465a5('bum): par bgyi ste/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das
465a6('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung/
465a7('bum): de dag kyang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//
465b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /chos nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/chos kyi dbyings kyi
465b2('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod
465b3('bum): par bgyi ste/chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das chos
465b4('bum): mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/chos mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /chos
465b5('bum): mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi snod do//bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin
465b6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/bsam
465b7('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das bag
466a1('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
466a2('bum): mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa
466a3('bum): thams cad spangs pa'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i
466a4('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das mi nyams pa'i chos
466a5('bum): nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /mi
466a6('bum): nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do//de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha
466a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni
466b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom
466b2('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye ba mi 'grag pa'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//
466b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa blong ba ma mchis pa dang /dor ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de
466b4('bum): dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba dang /bstan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
466b5('bum): sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de//
466b6('bum): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do//de
466b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgoms pa'o//de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /de bzhin
467a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis
467a2('bum): byur bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog gi/bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
467a3('bum): gis byur bur gtams pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol
467a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
467a5('bum): sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod
467a6('bum): pa mnga' ste/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin goshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang /bkur stir bgyid pa dang /
467a7('bum): phu dud du bgyid pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa'ang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/
467b1('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/mtshe ma'i lha 'am/dga' ldan gyi lha'am/'phrul dga'i lha
467b2('bum): 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
467b3('bum): sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /bklags shing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid
467b4('bum): la bgyid na/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
467b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid
467b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
467b7('bum): par 'gyur ro//chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
468a1('bum): ro//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//thog ma dang tha ma med
468a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//chos
468a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
468a4('bum): 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
468a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
468a6('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su
468a7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bsam gtan
468b1('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rnam
468b2('bum): par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
468b3('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
468b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
468b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par
468b6('bum): 'gyur ro//de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam//
468b7('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes bu'i lus sam/brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/tshangs pa'i gzugs
469a1('bum): sam/ngal bas pa'i gzugs kyang rung ste/lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyis
469a2('bum): las 'das te/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par
469a3('bum): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni
469a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/glo ba ma ches pa'ang ma mchis/mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang
