469a5('bum): ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis/rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par
469a6('bum): bgyis na/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
469a7('bum): rnams la'ang /rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs
469b1('bum): ma mchis pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag kyang chos kyi sku dang //
469b2('bum): gzugs kyi sku dang /ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing /mchod par 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi/klag par bgyi/kun
469b3('bum): chub par bgyi/mchod par bgyi/gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
469b4('bum): gyi khams grangs dang /tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am
469b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
469b6('bum): kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar
469b7('bum): bgyi/klag par bgyi/kun chub par bgyi/mchod par bgyi/gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o//bcom ldan
470a1('bum): 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid do/gnyis gang zhe na/'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do//bcom ldan
470a2('bum): 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /stong pa
470a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
470a4('bum): kyi ye shes dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /rang bzhin
470a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
470a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i
470a7('bum): ye shes dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang /stobs lnga'i ye shes dang /byang chub
470b1('bum): kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang //
470b2('bum): tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
470b3('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang /ting nge
470b4('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /
470b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang /dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes
470b6('bum): dang /mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /'jig rten gyi chos
470b7('bum): rnams kyi ye shes dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o//de la 'dus ma
471a1('bum): byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /gnas pa ma mchis pa dang
471a2('bum): gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /'grib
471a3('bum): pam mchis b+ha /don du mams cad dug nyid do//chos thams cad byung pa nyid ga la g+sa no/sa rnams cang ni dang sa po ma mchis pa du /dzin
471a4('bum): 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
471a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang
471a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mA 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
471a7('bum): rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
471b1('bum): 'tshang rgya'o//da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chod med grangs med pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
471b2('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
471b3('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /ma
471b4('bum): byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
471b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/rgyun du zhugs pa'i
471b6('bum): 'bras bu thob bo/thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po/thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/thob bo//
471b7('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob po/thob po/'thob par 'gyur ro//'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang
472a1('bum): sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/rang sangs rgyas gang ji skad cig
472a2('bum): 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/rang byang chub thob bo/thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir
472a3('bum): zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /dmigs pa med pa'i
472a4('bum): tshul dang /skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /mngon par
472a5('bum): 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang /len pa med pa'i tshul dang /'dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /dbri ba med pa'i tshul dang /bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /blang ba med pa'i tshul
472a6('bum): dang /spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol
472a7('bum): tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/pha rol ma yin/thang du 'dug pa ma yin/gshong
472b1('bum): du 'dug pa ma yin/mnyam pa ma yin/mi mnyam pa ma yin/mtshan ma ma yin/mtshan ma med pa ma yin/'jig rten pa ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin//
472b2('bum): 'dus byas ma yin/'dus ma byas ma yin/dge ba ma yin/mi dge ba ma yin/'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/kau shi ka shes rab kyi
472b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma
472b4('bum): yin/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos
472b5('bum): rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/kau shi kau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni//
472b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol
472b7('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/bam po brgya nyer bdun pa//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste//
473a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/sems can thams cad
473a2('bum): kyi sems dang /spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so//sems can du gdags par dmigs pa ma mchis so//bdag tu dmigs pa ma
473a3('bum): mchis so//sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so//srog tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//'gro bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//gso bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//
473a4('bum): skyes bur dmigs pa ma mchis so//gang zag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//shed can du dmigs pa ma mchis so//shed bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//byed pa
473a5('bum): por dmigs pa ma mchis so//tshor ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//shes pa por dmigs pa ma mchis so//mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzugs su
473a6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//'du shes su dmigs pa ma mchis so//'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par shes par
473a7('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//rna bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//snar dmigs pa ma mchis so//lcer dmigs pa ma mchis so//lus
473b1('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so//yid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis so//sgrar dmigs pa ma mchis so//drir dmigs pa ma mchis
473b2('bum): so//ror dmigs pa ma mchis so//reg tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//chos su dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i rnam
473b3('bum): par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//lus kyi rnam par
473b4('bum): shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg
473b5('bum): par dmigs pa ma mchis so//sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs
473b6('bum): pa ma mchis so//yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor b.rarwa dmigs pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg
473b7('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
474a1('bum): tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
474a2('bum): byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//chu'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//me'i khams su dmigs pa ma
474a3('bum): mchis so//rlung gi khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//nam mkha'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis
474a4('bum): so//ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis so//'du byed du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//ming dang gzugs su
474a5('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//skye mched drug tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//reg par dmigs pa ma mchis so//tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//sred par
474a6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//len par dmigs pa ma mchis so//srid par dmigs pa ma mchis so//skye bar dmigs pa ma mchis so//rga shir dmigs
474a7('bum): pa ma mchis so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro dmigs pa ma mchis so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu
474b1('bum): phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//shes
474b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//phyi nang stong pa nyid du
474b3('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs
474b4('bum): pa ma mchis so//'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs
474b5('bum): pa ma mchis so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid du
474b6('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//mi dmigs
474b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//dngos
475a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//yang dag par spong ba rnams
475a2('bum): su dmigs pa ma mchis so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//dbang po rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//stobs rnams su dmigs
475a3('bum): pa ma mchis so//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
475a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//bsam gtan+da rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//tshad med pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis
475a5('bum): so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis so//mthar gyis gnas
475a6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang mtshan mA med pa dang smon pa med par dmigs pa ma mchis
475a7('bum): so//mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams su
475b1('bum): dmigs pa ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//mi 'jigs pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//so so yang
475b2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//snying rje chen por dmigs pa ma mchis so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//
475b3('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis
475b4('bum): sa/dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//byang chub
475b5('bum): tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//sangs rgyas su dmigs pa ma mchis so//sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs
475b6('bum): pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang /gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang /gang du
475b7('bum): dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/de de bzhin te/byang chub sems
476a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyod pas des byang chub kyang mi
476a2('bum): dmigs na/sangs rgyas lta ci smos/sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
476a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka byang
476a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/gtong ba'ang
476a5('bum): mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so//bzod pa'ang
476a6('bum): mi dmigs/bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi
476a7('bum): dmigs/le lo'ang mi dmigs so//bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs so//shes
476b1('bum): rab kyang mi dmigs/shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/gzugs
476b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa
476b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lus
476b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
476b5('bum): ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i rnam par
476b6('bum): shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi
476b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
477a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
477a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i
477a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
477a4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
477a5('bum): ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rlung gi
477a6('bum): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /ma rig pa mi dmigs
477a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang /'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /skye mched drug
477b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
477b2('bum): srid pa mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang /skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul drang /rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshul
477b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i
477b4('bum): tshul dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
477b5('bum): dang /phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi
477b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
477b7('bum): tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi
478a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang gi mtshan
478a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /ngo bo nyid
478a3('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dran pa nye byar bzhag pa bani mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
478a4('bum): yang drag par sbyong ba bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa byin mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dbang po lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /stobs lnga
478a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'phags
478a6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gzugs med pa'i
478a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ban mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
478b1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma meng pa dang smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mngon par shes pa lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi dmigs
478b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi
478b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
478b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi
478b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rang byang chub mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
478b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su
478b7('bum): gtong ba'i sbyin pa'o pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
479a1('bum): chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang
479a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol
479a3('bum): tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//
479a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
479a5('bum): par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/chos la rnam par lta ba'i/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
479a6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/dzam+bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/me tog sna tshogs can/'bras bu sna tshogs
479a7('bum): can/dbyibs sna tshogs can/chu zhing sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang /de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/bye brag mi dmigs te/gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i
479b1('bum): grangs su 'gro bar zad do//kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang
479b2('bum): khyad par ram/bye brag mi dmigs so//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i
479b3('bum): slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o//
479b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am
479b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing /glegs bam du bgyis te/bcangs pa dang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /
479b6('bum): phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par
479b7('bum): bgyis te/de nas gong du ji skad du bstan pa bzhin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las shes
480a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/gzhan la sprul na/de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel bur 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
480a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
480a3('bum): la las/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
480a4('bum): ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod pa byas pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/de bzhin
480a5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te/bgo ba shar byas pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
480a6('bum): sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
480a7('bum): ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod par byas na/de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin//
480b1('bum): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/de la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin
480b2('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil
480b3('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/phu dud du bgyis/mchod par bgyis pa bas/gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru
480b4('bum): tsam gzhan la stsal na/'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang //
480b5('bum): don de nyid gzigs te/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/sems can gyi ris na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis
480b6('bum): 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du/thugs rje chen po bskyed de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so//bcom ldan 'das gang la las//
480b7('bum): chung ngu na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la/mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyis na/de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug
481a1('bum): par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs
481a2('bum): kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phyi ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /
481a3('bum): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/phu dud du byas/mchod pa byas po bas/gang la las shes rab kyi pha
481a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
481a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du song ste/bshad cing bstan pa dang /brjod cing bkrol ba dang /rnam/
481a6('bum): par phye ste gsal bar byas na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/de ni ston pa yin par
481a7('bum): bsam mo//bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
481b1('bum): ston pa yin te/smyon pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/smon pa khyod kyang shes pa kya
481b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la skabs pas/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
481b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs
481b4('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud
481b5('bum): na med de/de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon
481b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di la bslabs shing /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
481b7('bum): kyis kyang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong
482a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob bo thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /shes rab
482a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
482a3('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
482a4('bum): par zhugs so 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
482a5('bum): rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
482a6('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna
482a7('bum): tshogs kyis/mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang /bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang /phu dud du bya bar 'dod pa dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi
482b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bye ma dang /nabapa' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs
482b2('bum): kyis rim gror bya'o//bkur sti bya'o//babu dud du phyo'o//mchod par b+h+yo/kau shi ka seM de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu hrIt+tam+b+ha
482b3('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byas te/brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snya man/kau shi ka
482b4('bum): de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /mi dang lha dang lha ma yon du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang
482b5('bum): 'dra ba 'am/lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/mngon par sangs rgyas
482b6('bum): pa de nyid la/rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dung dang /mchod pa byas te/brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so//kau shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/'di lta ste shes rab kyi
482b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/kau shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/phu dud du byed/mchod par byed de/de ltar/
483a1('bum): rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /phu dud dang /mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
483a2('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'
483a3('bum): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dran dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba lta ci
483a4('bum): smos/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
483a5('bum): pa 'di nyid la/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs
483a6('bum): kyis/rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni//
483a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
483b1('bum): rnams so//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams so//kau shi ka de lta bas na//
483b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo 'am/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mos shes
483b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil
483b4('bum): snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//phu dud du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/bla na med pa yang
483b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
483b6('bum): rnams kyis kyang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo thob po 'thob par
483b7('bum): 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/lha'i dbang po brgya
484a1('bum): byin la bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
484a2('bum): bkod par gyur na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
484a3('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa 'am/
484a4('bum): bri ba 'am/kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i
484a5('bum): chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo slob cing /yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang /'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i
484a6('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang /'thob par 'gyur ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang /'thob par 'gyur ba dang /
484a7('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang /'thob par 'gyur ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang /'thob par 'gyur
484b1('bum): ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang /'thob par 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
484b2('bum): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang /'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par
484b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya
484b4('bum): cher bstan to//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
484b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong
484b6('bum): pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
484b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong po nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
485a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snang
485a2('bum): pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
485a3('bum): bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
485a4('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
485a5('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
485a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga'
485a7('bum): ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos te/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgya cher bstan to//de dag la bslabs shing //
485b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
485b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
485b3('bum): ches mang du 'phel gyi/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
485b4('bum): pa'i sems can rnams ni/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun du zhugs pa'i
485b5('bum): 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
485b6('bum): 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/kau shi ka gang la las dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
485b7('bum): la bkod pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas/la la zhig gis sems
486a1('bum): can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na/'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/dzam+bu'i gling gi sems
486a2('bum): can thams cad rang byang chub tu bkod pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag
486a3('bum): na/'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi tshul
486a4('bum): rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir
486a5('bum): mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams so//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
486a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang /mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/
486a7('bum): bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye mo dang /na bza' dang /
486b1('bum): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /phu dud du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o//kau shi ka
486b2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/dzam+bi'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/rigs
486b3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
486b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ko shi ka de bas kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bri ba 'am/klag pa 'am/kha
486b5('bum): ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan//
486b6('bum): te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i
486b7('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras
487a1('bum): bu thob par gyur to//thob zo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
487a2('bum): kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur
487a3('bum): to 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang chu'o//mdzan
487a4('bum): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
487a5('bum): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang
487a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa
487a7('bum): nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin
487b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
487b2('bum): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs
487b3('bum): lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams
487b4('bum): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
487b5('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
487b6('bum): dang nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba
487b7('bum): chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
488a1('bum): gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de ni bsod nams/
488a2('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs
488a3('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs tshe zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod
488a4('bum): do|sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
488a5('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams
488a6('bum): yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod
488a7('bum): do/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad
488b1('bum): med che ba'i rgyu rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//
488b2('bum): nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
488b3('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha
488b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
488b5('bum): phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong
488b6('bum): pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor
488b7('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
489a1('bum): yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do///
489a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags
489a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
489a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
489a5('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
489a6('bum): stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
489a7('bum): yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa yod do//rang byang chub
489b1('bum): yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba
489b2('bum): rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
489b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lha zhog gi/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de
489b4('bum): dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
489b5('bum): mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am
489b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs blam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams che sa mang du 'phel lo//
489b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya tshor bston te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
490a1('bum): kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob
490a2('bum): par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par
490a3('bum): 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//
490a4('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
490a5('bum): ro/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'ching
490a6('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang /gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
490a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid
490b1('bum): dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas
490b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams
490b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
490b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi
490b5('bum): yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i
490b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
490b7('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
491a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang //
491a2('bum): dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am
491a3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod
491a4('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag
491a5('bum): yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen
491a6('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod
491a7('bum): dodade gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//
491b1('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
491b2('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha
491b3('bum): rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha
491b4('bum): rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
491b5('bum): rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye moched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul
491b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes
491b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//
492a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma
492a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshani nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi
492a3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag
492a4('bum): pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub
492a5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa
492a6('bum): rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod
492a7('bum): do/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shos pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi
492b1('bum): sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po rnams yod/
492b2('bum): dor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
492b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//
492b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems
492b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi
492b6('bum): khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las
492b7('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa
493a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
493a2('bum): gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de
493a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu
493a4('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob
493a5('bum): par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob
493a6('bum): par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//
493a7('bum): thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/
493b1('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs
493b2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
493b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid
493b4('bum): dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus
493b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos
493b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
493b7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /
494a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa
494a2('bum): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar
494a3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
494a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa
494a5('bum): chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka/
494a6('bum): rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya
494a7('bum): ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
494b1('bum): 'dri las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs
494b2('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
494b3('bum): yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs
494b4('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
494b5('bum): dod/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//
494b6('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung
494b7('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
495a1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min
495a2('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi
495a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi
495a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas
495a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
495a6('bum): yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo
495a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi
495b1('bum): rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i
495b2('bum): bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad
495b3('bum): yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par
495b4('bum): shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
495b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig
495b6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam
495b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra ba tsam pa rnams
496a1('bum): yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
496a2('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya nyer brgyad pa//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig
496a3('bum): rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las/dge
496a4('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/
496a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis//
496a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang /klag pa dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe
496a7('bum): na/kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
496b1('bum): mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//
496b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid
496b3('bum): thob par gyur to//thob po/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub
496b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par
496b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa
496b6('bum): med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
496b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa
497a1('bum): nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
497a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa
497a3('bum): nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
497a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang
497a5('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
497a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin
497a7('bum): thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
497b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa
497b2('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi kA rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du byis shing //
497b3('bum): klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
497b4('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing
497b5('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mcho
497b6('bum): ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod
497b7('bum): do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung
498a1('bum): snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dgo'i lha rnams//
498a2('bum): yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams
498a3('bum): yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//miche ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang
498a4('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
498a5('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi
498a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab
498a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid
498b1('bum): yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma
498b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi
498b3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag/
498b4('bum): pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan
498b5('bum): lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams
498b6('bum): yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam
498b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo
499a1('bum): rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po/
499a2('bum): yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
499a3('bum): bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
499a4('bum): yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa'
499a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi
499a6('bum): khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/kau shrI kra stong gsum gyi stong cheni po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i
499a7('bum): las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom
499b1('bum): ldan 'dras mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shos rab kyi pa/
499b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bri ba dang /klag pa dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'dri
499b3('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya tshor bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
499b4('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir
499b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid
499b6('bum): thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang
499b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag
500a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
500a2('bum): kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
500a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
500a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas
500a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
500a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
500a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs
500b1('bum): lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i badren pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /
500b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
500b3('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
500b4('bum): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
500b5('bum): dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu
500b6('bum): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams
500b7('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag
501a1('bum): yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal
501a2('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod
501a3('bum): do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//
501a4('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
501a5('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams
501a6('bum): yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
501a7('bum): yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
