501b1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims
501b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
501b3('bum): phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid
501b4('bum): yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa
501b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos
501b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams
501b7('bum): yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod
502a1('bum): do/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod
502a2('bum): do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
502a3('bum): yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa
502a4('bum): rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod
502a5('bum): do| lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod
502a6('bum): do|/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams
502a7('bum): yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
502b1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi
502b2('bum): bu mo la las/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
502b3('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo ga gis/
502b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka
502b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag
502b6('bum): pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig
502b7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid
503a1('bum): thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par
503a2('bum): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//
503a3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
503a4('bum): ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
503a5('bum): pa dang /brdzun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
503a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
503a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
503b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye
503b2('bum): bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i
503b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam
503b4('bum): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
503b5('bum): par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
503b6('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
503b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
504a1('bum): paglegs bam du b+his shing /klag pa dang /bri ba drung /khyu ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes
504a2('bum): par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing
504a3('bum): mtho bo rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
504a4('bum): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
504a5('bum): yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang
504a6('bum): pa'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang drang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung
504a7('bum): dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che
504b1('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang
504b2('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung
504b3('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
504b4('bum): phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
504b5('bum): pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid
504b6('bum): yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba myed
504b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos///
505a1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par
505a2('bum): spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam
505a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
505a4('bum): yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
505a5('bum): med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs
505a6('bum): pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod
505a7('bum): do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//
505b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//
505b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod/
505b3('bum): dorakau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i
505b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu dkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
505b5('bum): 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi
505b6('bum): bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
505b7('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
506a1('bum): dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob
506a2('bum): par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te//thob bo/'thob
506a3('bum): par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob
506a4('bum): bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par
506a5('bum): 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
506a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
506a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /
506b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa
506b2('bum): nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa
506b3('bum): ljid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
506b4('bum): nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
506b5('bum): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
506b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mA med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
506b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po
507a1('bum): dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka
507a2('bum): rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya
507a3('bum): ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
507a4('bum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi
507a5('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan
507a6('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams
507a7('bum): yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i
507b1('bum): lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dgo'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
507b2('bum): yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung
507b3('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
507b4('bum): yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do///
507b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po yod do//bsam gtan
507b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
507b7('bum): do chen po stong ba nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//
508a1('bum): phog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang
508a2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
508a3('bum): pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs
508a4('bum): rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams
508a5('bum): yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
508a6('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams
508a7('bum): yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen
508b1('bum): po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
508b2('bum): do/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do///
508b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems
508b4('bum): dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka gzhan yang dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can
508b5('bum): rnams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi la
508b6('bum): bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu
508b7('bum): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis
509a1('bum): bka' stsalnga pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mau gla gos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i grogs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton/
509a2('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa mong
509a3('bum): po'i chos rnams rgya che bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu'om rigs kyi bu myo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs por gyur to//'jug go//'jug
509a4('bum): par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te//thob bo//'thob
509a5('bum): par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur
509a6('bum): ro/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
509a7('bum): kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs por gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
509b1('bum): rdzogs par spangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di //
509b2('bum): ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
509b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid
509b4('bum): dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
509b5('bum): nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rong bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
509b6('bum): dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong
509b7('bum): ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
510a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
510a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
510a3('bum): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /
510a4('bum): dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
510a5('bum): kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams
510a6('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas
510a7('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdog gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
510b1('bum): lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dab
510b2('bum): byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do///
510b3('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha
510b4('bum): rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yid do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
510b5('bum): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//me gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og
510b6('bum): min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams
510b7('bum): yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
511a1('bum): pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod//
511a2('bum): dod phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod
511a3('bum): do/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin
511a4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//
511a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
511a6('bum): rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i
511a7('bum): bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//chad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad
511b1('bum): yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa
511b2('bum): rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par
511b3('bum): rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
511b4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du
511b5('bum): zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub
511b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi kra gling chen po bzhi pa'i
511b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam
512a1('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam
512a2('bum): du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
512a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo grang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha
512a4('bum): ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med
512a5('bum): pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug
512a6('bum): par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par
512a7('bum): 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang
512b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub
512b2('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon
512b3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shwa ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
512b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
512b5('bum): phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus
512b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin
512b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
513a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga
513a2('bum): dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
513a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /
513a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang //
513a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos
513a6('bum): tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam
513a7('bum): du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir
513b1('bum): zhen/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i
513b2('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod
513b3('bum): do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
513b4('bum): yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams
513b5('bum): yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod de//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//
513b6('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha
513b7('bum): rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha'
514a1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du
514a2('bum): shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus
514a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
514a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus
514a5('bum): mo byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin
514a6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yong
514a7('bum): do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu
514b1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//
514b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong ngo //rnam
514b3('bum): par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon
514b4('bum): par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//
514b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir
514b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams
514b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang
515a1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
515a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po brgya nyer dgu pa//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi
515a3('bum): khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la
515a4('bum): las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de//tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka
515a5('bum): de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs
515a6('bum): pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shrI ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam
515a7('bum): klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka do ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
515b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par byung //
515b2('bum): 'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob
515b3('bum): boda'athob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//
515b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub
515b5('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon
515b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
515b7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
516a1('bum): pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid
516a2('bum): dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa
516a3('bum): nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa
516a4('bum): nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
516a5('bum): pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang
516a6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
516a7('bum): dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
516b1('bum): soso yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen du
516b2('bum): dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shI ka rnam drangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol
516b3('bum): tu phyin pa glegs byam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de
516b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to//de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram
516b5('bum): ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod
516b6('bum): do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yodado/'phrul dga' lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yong /
516b7('bum): tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod de//chings chen gyi lha rnams yod do//sdang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
517a1('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dga'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang/
517a2('bum): dod dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i
517a3('bum): lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha'
517a4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes
517a5('bum): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson
517a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//
517a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma
517b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
517b2('bum): yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa
517b3('bum): nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams yod
517b4('bum): dod dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
517b5('bum): yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar
517b6('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod
517b7('bum): doting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par
518a1('bum): rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir//
518a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lamo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams
518a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang
518a4('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
518a5('bum): rnams yod do//kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rnams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
518a6('bum): kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo l+ya las/bsam gtan bzhi lnga bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
518a7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang
518b1('bum): du'aphel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //badre bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/
518b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches myung du
518b3('bum): 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing //
518b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
518b5('bum): thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
518b6('bum): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob
518b7('bum): par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//
519a1('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon
519a2('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
519a3('bum): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang //brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa
519a4('bum): nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma
519a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams
519a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
519a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan
519b1('bum): lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
519b2('bum): dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams
519b3('bum): cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams
519b4('bum): pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs
519b5('bum): des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
519b6('bum): byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya
519b7('bum): tshor bstan te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
520a1('bum): do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cuHgsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul/
520a2('bum): dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha
520a3('bum): rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha
520a4('bum): rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod
520a5('bum): drodo/chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
520a6('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes
520a7('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i
520b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
520b2('bum): phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po
520b3('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang
520b4('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod de//
520b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag
520b6('bum): pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag
520b7('bum): rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad mod pa rnams yod do//
521a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par
521a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//
521a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos//
521a4('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod
521a5('bum): do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba
521a6('bum): rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
521a7('bum): yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka shor phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
521b1('bum): bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi lnga bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
521b2('bum): pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol
521b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau sha ka de byas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo glang
521b4('bum): gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
521b5('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi
521b6('bum): bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par
521b7('bum): 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob
522a1('bum): par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par//
522a2('bum): gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//
522a3('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon pararo rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs
522a4('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
522a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa
522a6('bum): nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid
522a7('bum): dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin
522b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong
522b2('bum): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
522b3('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
522b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin
522b5('bum): thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi
522b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan
522b7('bum): ngag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi kau rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /klag/
523a1('bum): pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shra
523a2('bum): ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing
523a3('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe
523a4('bum): ma'i lha rnams yod do//dgo' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//
523a5('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams
523a6('bum): yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
523a7('bum): yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
523b1('bum): mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam
523b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du
523b3('bum): shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson
523b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi/
523b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod
523b6('bum): drod du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa
523b7('bum): nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
524a1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//
524a2('bum): stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan
524a3('bum): rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
524a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//
524a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen
524a6('bum): po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod
524a7('bum): do dadagra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yad do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//
524b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
524b2('bum): rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shri ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems
524b3('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon
524b4('bum): par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
524b5('bum): mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
524b6('bum): pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
524b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan to/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
525a1('bum): gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
525a2('bum): thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//
525a3('bum): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
525a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
525a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag
525a6('bum): kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
525a7('bum): dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa
525b1('bum): nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma
525b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
525b3('bum): dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang //
525b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
525b5('bum): dang rnam par thar pa brgyud dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mA med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
525b6('bum): par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
525b7('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/
526a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
526a2('bum): phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe
526a3('bum): no/kau sha~M ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing
526a4('bum): mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams
526a5('bum): yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan
526a6('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad mod snang
526a7('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang pa'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi
526b1('bum): lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshod med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i
526b2('bum): lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
526b3('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol
526b4('bum): tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//
526b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do//chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa
526b6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa
526b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa
527a1('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba ma/
527a2('bum): yod do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod
527a3('bum): do/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar
527a4('bum): pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod do//mngon par
527a5('bum): shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so/
527a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
527a7('bum): 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
527b1('bum): nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang
527b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
527b3('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
527b4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
527b5('bum): mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
527b6('bum): kyi bu ma gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs pa ma klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de
527b7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya tshor bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
528a1('bum): kyi bu mo drag yang dag pa'i skyon mong par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par
528a2('bum): 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//
528a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro///
528a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par
528a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med
528a6('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
528a7('bum): tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid
528b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med
528b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
528b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul
528b4('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par
528b5('bum): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa myed pa dang /mngon par shes
528b6('bum): pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
528b7('bum): bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos
529a1('bum): tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs pam du dri
529a2('bum): shing daklag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes
529a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/chos thams cad rgya cher bstun te/de dag yod pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//khyim
529a4('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do//mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//
529a5('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
529a6('bum): rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i
529a7('bum): lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i
529b1('bum): lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min
529b2('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med
529b3('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
529b4('bum): pa yod do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//phyi stong pa nyid yod do//phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod
529b5('bum): dod chen po stong pa nyid yod do//don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
529b6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod
529b7('bum): dod de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod do//yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do//rdzu 'phrul
530a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams yod do//dbang po rnams yod do//stobs rnams yod do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do//'phags pa'i
530a2('bum): bden pa rnams yod do//bsam gtan rnams yod do//tshad med pa rnams yod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do//mthar gyis
530a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa yod do//mngon par shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do///
530a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do//mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do//snying rje chen po yod do//sangs rgyas
530a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid yod do//rang
530a6('bum): byang chub yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//phyir mi 'ong
530a7('bum): ba rnams yod do//dgra bcom pa rnams yod do//rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
530b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam
530b2('bum): gtan bzhi la bkod de/tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
530b3('bum): bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu
530b4('bum): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
530b5('bum): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag lo bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
530b6('bum): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go//'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
530b7('bum): por gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//
531a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems
531a2('bum): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs
531a3('bum): bar 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe no//'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
531a4('bum): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong
531a5('bum): papo nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las
531a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong
531a7('bum): pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag
531b1('bum): bar spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
531b2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge
531b3('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
531b4('bum): brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs
531b5('bum): des kyang /rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing /klag pa dang /bri ba dang /kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de bas
531b6('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal
531b7('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bo rnams yad do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum
532a1('bum): gyi lha rnams yod do//mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do//dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do//gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//
532a2('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do//snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung snang gi
532a3('bum): lha rnams yod do//tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//kun sdang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do//dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med dge ba'i
532a4('bum): lha rnams yod do//dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do//che ba'i lha rnams yod do//chung che'i lha rnams yod do//tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi che
532a5('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do//mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha'
532a6('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//'du shes med 'du shes
532a7('bum): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do///zhus dag/
